I'm guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.
When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.
When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
If there's a plan, I'll forget it. If I don't forget it, I'll ignore it.
I have a 'tell' that reveals when I'm lying.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.
An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I'm okay with that.

_.displayName: roba comuna fosca inclosa una caputxa

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una insígnia de Dimir, tres ganivets petits, un joc de {@item common clothes|phb} de color fosc i l'equip inicial del fons descrit en aquest capítol per al vostre gremi secundari

entries.name: Característica: identitat falsa
entries: Tens més d'una identitat. El que portes la majoria del temps et fa semblar membre d'un gremi diferent de la casa Dimir. Tens documentació, coneguts establerts i disfresses que et permeten assumir aquest personatge i encaixar en el gremi secundari.
Sempre que trieu, podeu deixar aquesta identitat i barrejar-vos amb les masses sense gremis de la ciutat.
Considera per què estàs integrat al gremi secundari. Crea una història amb el teu DM, inspirant-te en rodar a la taula següent o escollint un motiu que et convingui.

rows: My parents belong to this guild, and I let them think I'm following in their footsteps.
I've been assigned to track this guild's activities.
I've been assigned to get close to an individual in this guild and learn their secrets.
I've been assigned to recruit a new Dimir spy from the ranks of this guild.
I was a member of this guild before the Dimir recruited me.
I don't like what this guild stands for and want to destroy it from within.
I secretly wish I could leave the Dimir and join this guild, but there is no escaping the Dimir.
I chose this guild at random or on a lark.

entries.name: Encanteris del gremi Dimir
entries: {@i Requisit previ: funció de classe Spellcasting o Màgia de Pacte}

Per a tu, els encanteris de la taula d'encanteris del gremi Dimir s'afegeixen a la llista d'encanteris de la teva classe d'encanteris. (Si sou un personatge multiclasse amb diverses llistes d'encanteris, aquests encanteris s'afegeixen a totes elles.)

entries.caption: Encanteris del gremi Dimir
rows: Truc
{@spell acabalar pensaments|GGR}, {@spell mà de mag}
{@spell ego camuflatge}, {@spell adormir}
{@spell detectar pensaments}, {@spell passar desapercebudament}
{@spell forma gasosa}, {@spell fondre's dins la pedra}, {@spell indetectable}
4th
{@spell ull arcà}, {@spell llibertat de moviments}
5th
{@spell modificar memòria}

entries: La teva màgia està pensada per ser subtil i indetectable, però pot atraure ombres o núvols de boira al teu voltant mentre feu els vostres encanteris. Mitjançant el cantrip {@spell acabalar pensaments|GGR} que es descriu a continuació, podeu convertir els pensaments d'una criatura (inclosos els vostres) en un fil de pensament que els altres puguin llegir, compartir o robar. Aquests fils de pensament es tracten com una moneda valuosa entre els Dimir.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Habilitats en la infiltració, la disfressa i l'engany, els membres de la Casa Dimir semblen inescrutables. És possible que la vostra personalitat i els vostres ideals no es manifestin mai, o us poden marcar com un membre peculiar del vostre gremi secundari.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat
rows: I'm good at hiding my true thoughts and feelings.
When I'm in doubt about revealing something, I assume it's a secret, and I don't share it.
I like to sound mysterious, because wisdom hidden grows deeper with time.
I have no patience with people who get in my way.
I love hearing about other people's nightmares.
Combat is meant to be quick, clean, and one-sided.
I like to stick to the shadows.
I never show my anger. I just plot my revenge.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My true guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Control}. I like pulling the strings. (Lawful)
{@b Secrets}. I collect secrets and never reveal them. (Any)
{@b Knowledge}. I want to know as much as I can about this city and how it works. (Any)
{@b Independence}. I value the freedom to pursue my own goals without interference. (Chaotic)
{@b Nihilism}. I don't believe in anything, and anyone who does is a fool. (Neutral)

entries.caption: Bons
rows: I discovered a secret I can't let anyone else uncover—including my guild superiors.
I formed a close friendship or romance with someone in the guild I'm infiltrating.
The Dimir agent who recruited me was unmasked and killed. My revenge on the killers will be thorough and painful.
I spend as much time as I can in the Ismeri Library because I'm certain an information hub operates behind its facade. I want its secrets!
I'm utterly loyal to my superior in the guild, more than to the guild or its guildmaster.
Someone has discovered my true identity.

entries.caption: Defectes
rows: I like secrets so much that I'm reluctant to share details of a plan even with those who need to know.
I would let my friends die rather than reveal my true identity.
I have trouble trusting anyone but myself.
I have a particular vice that puts all my secrets at risk if I'm not careful.
I'm pretty sure I've done something horrible that I can't remember because of the guild's mind magic.
I put too much trust in the people who give me orders.

entries.name: Contactes
entries: Com a agent de la Casa Dimir que treballa encobert, tens contactes limitats dins del teu gremi. Les vostres relacions dins del vostre gremi secundari, sota l'aparença de la vostra identitat falsa, solen ser més extenses.

Feu una volta a la taula de contactes de Dimir, donant-vos un aliat que us serveixi de contacte a Dimir. A continuació, tira dues vegades a la taula per al teu gremi secundari. La primera tirada et dóna un aliat allà, i la segona tirada et dóna un rival.

entries.caption: Dimir Contactes
rows: I know a Dimir courier who relays messages to me from someone higher up the chain of command.
I get orders from a shapeshifter I recognize only through a series of code phrases we exchange.
An ostentatiously wealthy vampire is my secret guild superior, summoning me to a luxurious estate by means of coded messages.
I have never met my guild contact, but I receive telepathic messages, usually in my dreams.
I've never met my guild contact, but I get coded messages from a pattern of street lights and graffiti.
I didn't discover the identity of my guild contact until after we had begun a romantic relationship.
My superior maintains an elaborate identity as a young street urchin... unless it's all a lie, and I'm being sent on ridiculous missions by a twisted child.
My sibling and I both get telepathic orders from a mysterious contact, and I'm starting to question the authenticity of my sibling's orders.

entries.name: Com m'encaixo?
entries: Com a aventurer Dimir, sou membre de la xarxa d'espies, lladres, assassins i mags mentals del gremi que s'amaga darrere de la façana del gremi públic. A la superfície, House Dimir presenta l'aparició d'una xarxa de missatgers, investigadors, periodistes de mitjans i arxivers, que s'ocupen d'informació i difonen notícies. Però tu i els teus companys negocien secrets. Utilitzeu símbols, runes i senyals secrets per comunicar-vos de manera subrepticia amb altres agents Dimir, sovint a la vista.

Com qualsevol bon espia, tens múltiples identitats: la teva veritable cara com a agent de la casa Dimir; una identitat sense gremi; i un paper com a membre d'un altre gremi. Dins d'aquest gremi secundari, és possible que ja estigueu en una missió per a la casa Dimir, assignat per espiar el gremi, recopilar informació sobre una persona o reclutar un altre espia de les files del gremi. O aquest gremi podria ser un punt de llançament per a la vostra missió real. Potser, per exemple, se't va ordenar infiltrar-te a l'Azorius amb l'esperança d'accedir a un reclus notori en una presó d'Azorius.

_.displayName: roba comuna de color fosc

_.special: l'equip inicial del fons descrit en aquest capítol per al vostre gremi secundari

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Fins i tot a la ciutat-estat de Naktamun, curosament construïda i curada, i en presència dels cinc déus, algunes persones es rebel·len contra les doctrines del Déu-Faraó. No qüestionen l'existència dels déus, és clar, perquè aquests déus són visibles gairebé cada dia als carrers de la ciutat. Tampoc qüestionen el fet de la vida després de la mort, que és evident a les mòmies ungit que els envolten, així com les mòmies merodeadores fora de l'Hekma. Més aviat, aquests dissidents simplement es neguen a seguir el curs ordenat de la vida que condueix al gloriós més enllà.

Alguns dissidents es veuen estimulats per la por, no volen sotmetre's a una mort violenta en els judicis (o en l'entrenament per als judicis). Alguns se senten moguts per la consciència, no volen matar els seus companys de conreu en les proves. Perquè encara que no poden negar que els déus existeixen, poden negar que els déus són justos, i poden lluitar per demostrar que els dictats d'un déu injust no s'han d'obeir. Alguns creuen que un déu (probablement Bontu) ha corromput el procés de les proves i el camí cap al més enllà. Altres intueixen correctament que el Déu-Faraó en realitat no tenia en ment els millors interessos del poble quan va ordenar la seva societat.

Un personatge que s'identifica com a dissident perd el benefici de la funció de fons de {@background initiate|psa} o {@background visir|psa}. En el seu lloc, el personatge obté la característica següent:

entries.name: Característica: Refugi de Dissidents
entries: Si volen tenir alguna esperança de supervivència, ja sigui amagat a la ciutat o expulsat al desert, els dissidents s'han d'ajudar mútuament. Pots trobar un lloc per amagar-te, descansar o recuperar-te entre altres dissidents. T'ajudaran a protegir-te dels que et cacen, possiblement fins i tot arriscant la vida per tu.

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un {@item daga|phb}, draps esquinçats, una barra de pa florit, una petita bàscula que pertany a Vorgansharax, la virulència mutilada, i una {@item pouch|phb} amb 5 mo de diverses monedes (recuperades durant la teva escapada de Phlan).

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Miserable

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Quan la virulència mutilada va descendir sobre Phlan, vas ser una de les desafortunades víctimes de la guerra. Capturat durant l'assalt inicial, t'has passat l'últim any de la teva vida com a joguina d'un amo capritxós i malèvol.

Mentre que molts dels vostres companys presoners van caure davant la fúria insaciable del drac durant els propers mesos, vosaltres i els vostres companys "supervivents" només us heu estalviat un destí pitjor com un dels experiments màgics del drac, deixant-vos a vosaltres i als que van sobreviure a la tortura marcats i desfigurats. .

Quines raons va tenir el drac per alliberar-vos pocs supervivents, ningú ho sap. Només temes que aquells que van morir sota la seva terrible urpa fossin els afortunats, i tu i els teus companys amb Cicatrius de Drac esteu condemnats a un destí pitjor que la mort.

entries.name: Origen
entries: Abans de l'atac coordinat de la virulència mutilada i els seus partidaris rebels de Puny Negre, una vegada vas ser ciutadà o visitant de Phlan. Tot i que el trauma de la teva prova recent ha alterat molt les teves motivacions i la teva percepció del món, la teva vida anterior encara s'aferra a tu i pinta els teus gestos, comportaments i visió de la vida. Trieu una entrada a la taula següent (o feu una tirada aleatòria) per determinar la vostra antiga ocupació abans de l'empresonament i la tortura. La vostra elecció determina el vostre domini de l'eina a partir d'aquest context.

rows: Dockworker/Fisherman
{@filter Vehicles (water)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (marítim)}
Tradesperson/Merchant
{@filter Eines d'Artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania}
Black Fist Soldier
{@filter Set de Joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=set de joc} or {@filter Vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (terrestre)}
Adventurer/Visitor
{@filter Vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (terrestre)}
Entertainer
{@filter Musical Instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}
Scholar/Healer
{@item Materials d'alquímia|phb} or {@item Herbalism kit|phb}
Criminal
{@item eines de lladre|phb}, {@item forgery kit|phb}, o {@item Disguise kit|phb}
Unskilled Laborer
{@filter Set de Joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=set de joc}

entries.name: Característica: Dragonscarred
entries: Durant un període de diversos mesos vau ser objecte de tortures màgiques i mundanes a les urpes de Vorgansharaxse i els seus sequaços. Aquests experiments t'han deixat horriblement desfigurat, però et marquen com un supervivent de la virulència mutilada. Això us ofereix una mica de fama i notorietat, perquè els que coneixen la vostra terrible experiència tenen ganes d'escoltar la història personalment, però dificulta dissimular la vostra aparença i amagar-vos de mirades indiscretes.

Podeu dedicar aquesta atenció a l'accés a persones i llocs que d'altra manera no tindries, per a tu i els teus companys. Nobles, erudits, mags i aquells que busquen esbrinar els secrets de la Virulència mutilada estaran encantats d'escoltar la vostra història de supervivència i aprendre quins secrets (si n'hi ha) podríeu posseir i/o estudiar la vostra aflicció amb gran interès. Tanmateix, temes que les teves afliccions no siguin del tot mundanes i que la virulència mutilada encara pugui tenir alguna raó nefasta per permetre la teva escapada, ja que les teves cicatrius cremen amb una fúria àcida i semblen retorçar-se sota la teva pell de vegades. Nota: aquesta funció és una variant de la funció Far Traveler.

entries.name: Desfiguració (opcional)
entries: A més de les cicatrius extenses, podeu triar una de les opcions següents per representar la vostra desfiguració. Aquesta desfiguració és purament estètica, deforme i horrible de veure.

rows: Small non-functional wing(s).
Misshapen, wing-like membranes along one or both arms.
Elongated, claw-like hand(s).
Elongated, claw-like feet.
Painful green scales randomly embedded in skin.
Bulbous, reptilian eye(s).
Enlarged dorsal spines.
Hair replaced with small irregular spines.
I am driven to escape my past, and rarely stay in one place long.
I know secrets of the Maimed Virulence, but fear the harm that may befall me should others learn them.
Speaking of my ordeal helps sooth the still open wounds in my soul.
My former life is meaningless, and was ripped to shreds by the claws of Vorgansharax. All that matters now is what I do with the future.
I have faced the worst a dragon can deliver and survived. I am fearless, and my resolve unshakable.
I am haunted my tortured past, and wake at night screaming at half-remembered horrors.
I sleep with my back to a wall or tree, and a weapon within arm's reach.
I am slow to trust, but incredibly loyal to those who have earned it.
Survivor. No matter the cost, I will take any action necessary to survive. (Any)
Independence. When in trouble, the only person I can rely on is myself. (Chaotic)
Compassionate. I have suffered long at the hands of a Dragon, and take pity and compassion on the suffering of others. (Good)
Secretive. I am withdrawn, and hide my monstrous appearance for fear of drawing unwanted attention. (Chaotic)
Justice. I have been wronged, and will not allow the same fate to befall others. (Lawful)
Sycophant. During my ordeal, I became a willing servant of the Maimed Virulence, and spy on his behalf. (Evil)
I have sworn vengeance on the Maimed Virulence and those that follow him.
I long to reunite with friends and family who may dwell among the Phlan Refugees, and protect them.
While a prisoner of the Maimed Virulence, I overheard rumors of an item or treasure the Dragon seeks. I will have that treasure for myself!
I seek to reclaim and rebuild my former life to the best of my ability.
I have been reborn as a child of Vorgansharax. I will claim my birthright as his chosen heir and successor.
I attribute my survival to the work of the divine, and seek to prove myself worthy of the honor.
I have been touched with dragon-greed, and have a lust for wealth which can never be satisfied.
I secretly believe others are plotting to harm me.
I no longer enjoy the simple pleasures in life. Food is but ashes and bile in my throat.
Anyone who refuses to celebrate my celebrity does not deserve my company.
I am paranoid and overly suspicious of others. Anyone may be an agent of the Maimed Virulence.
Once I make up my mind, I follow my chosen course of action regardless of the consequences.

_.special: petita escala d'abandonament que pertany a Vorgansharax: la virulència mutilada

_.displayName: bossa de diverses monedes (recuperades durant la teva fugida de Phlan)

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una {@item shovel|phb} o una {@item miner's pick|phb}, un {@item polispast|phb}, un {@item climber's kit|phb}, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb}, i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 5 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Ets un miner de la teva sort de les muntanyes Earthspur que no és aliè a les dificultats. Heu passat molt de temps vivint entre els nans, goliats i habitants del Sotafoscor que també treballen mines a la zona. En aquest punt, estàs tan còmode treballant sota terra com a dalt. Saps llegir una costura, dicker per subministraments amb el gnom de les profunditats, festejar amb nans i després trobar el camí de tornada a la superfície. Malauradament, encara no l'heu fet ric... Encara que has vingut a Mulmaster a buscar feina, els alts cims i les mines profundes dels Earthspurs encara et criden.

entries.name: Característica: Deep Miner
entries: Esteu acostumats a navegar pels llocs profunds de la terra. Mai us perdeu a les coves o mines si n'heu vist un mapa precís o n'heu passat abans. A més, podeu buscar aigua fresca i menjar per a vosaltres mateixos i fins a cinc persones més cada dia si esteu en una mina o coves naturals. Nota: aquesta funció és una variant de la funció Outlander.

rows: Nothing bothers me for long.
I hate the horrors of the Sotafoscor with a passion. They took my friends and family and almost got me.
Anything worth doing takes time and patience. I have learned to plan and wait for the things I want and to be patient to achieve my goals.
I can party with everyone. Whether with nans, or goliats, or gnom de les profunditatses, I can find a way to have a good time.
I'd rather be mining. This is okay; mining is better.
I think that I will stumble upon great riches if I just keep looking.
People who don't work with their hands and who live in houses are soft and weak.
I wish I were more educated. I look up to people who are.
Generosity. The riches of the earth are to be shared by all. (Good)
Greed. Gems and precious metals, I want them all for myself. (Evil)
Mooch. Property, schmoperty. If I need it, I take and use it. If I don't, I leave it for someone else. (Chaotic)
Boundaries. Everything and everyone has its prescribed place; I respect that and expect others to do the same. (Lawful)
Let it Be. I don't meddle in the affairs of others if I can avoid it. They're none of my business. (Neutral)
Materialist. I want riches to improve my life. (Any)
The people of the Earthspur mines are my family. I will do anything to protect them.
A gnom de les profunditatse saved my life when I was injured and alone. I owe his people a great debt.
I must behold and preserve the natural beauty of places below the earth.
Gems hold a special fascination for me, more than gold, land, magic, or power.
I want to explore new depths and scale new heights.
Someday I'm going to find the mother lode, then I'll spend the rest of my life in luxury.
I'm uncomfortable spending time under the open sky. I'd rather be indoors or underground.
I'm not used to being around other people much and sometimes get grouchy about it.
Good tools are more reliable than people. In a cave in, I would save a sturdy pick before a stranger.
I jealously guard my secrets, because I think others will take advantage of me if they learn what I know.
I am obsessed with getting rich. I always have a scheme brewing for making it big.
I'm afraid of the dark.

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, un tipus d'{@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} (un de la vostra elecció), el favor d'un admirador (carta d'amor, floc de cabell o baratija), {@item roba de disfressa |phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 15 gp

entries.name: Característica: Per demanda popular
entries: Sempre pots trobar un lloc per actuar, normalment en una fonda o taverna, però possiblement amb un circ, en un teatre o fins i tot a la cort d'un noble. En aquest lloc, rebeu allotjament i menjar gratuïts de nivell modest o còmode (segons la qualitat de l'establiment), sempre que actueu cada nit. A més, la teva actuació et converteix en una figura local. Quan els desconeguts et reconeixen en una ciutat on has actuat, normalment t'agraden.

entries.name: Especialitat
entries: Un bon animador és versàtil, condimentant cada actuació amb una varietat de rutines diferents. Trieu una o tres rutines o aneu a la taula següent per definir la vostra experiència com a animador.

rows: Actor
Dancer
Fire-eater
Jester
Juggler
Instrumentalist
Poet
Singer
Storyteller
Tumbler

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els animadors d'èxit han de ser capaços de captar i mantenir l'atenció del públic, de manera que tendeixen a tenir personalitats extravagants o contundents. S'inclinen cap al romàntic i sovint s'aferren a ideals alts de mentalitat sobre la pràctica de l'art i l'apreciació de la bellesa.

rows: I know a story relevant to almost every situation.
Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumors and spread gossip.
I'm a hopeless romantic, always searching for that "special someone".
Nobody stays angry at me or around me for long, since I can defuse any amount of tension.
I love a good insult, even one directed at me.
I get bitter if I'm not the center of attention.
I'll settle for nothing less than perfection.
I change my mood or my mind as quickly as I change key in a song.
Beauty. When I perform, I make the world better than it was. (Good)
Tradition. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten, for they teach us who we are. (Lawful)
Creativity. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action. (Chaotic)
Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame. (Evil)
People. I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform. That's all that matters. (Neutral)
Honesty. Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are. (Any)
My instrument is my most treasured possession, and it reminds me of someone I love.
Someone stole my precious instrument, and someday I'll get it back.
I want to be famous, whatever it takes.
I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against that person's.
I will do anything to prove myself superior to my hated rival.
I would do anything for the other members of my old troupe.
I'll do anything to win fame and renown.
I'm a sucker for a pretty face.
A scandal prevents me from ever going home again. That kind of trouble seems to follow me around.
I once satirized a noble who still wants my head. It was a mistake that I will likely repeat.
I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble.
Despite my best efforts, I am unreliable to my friends.

_.special: el favor d'un admirador (carta d'amor, floc de cabell o baratija)

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, una {@item roba de disfressa|phb|disfressa}, una {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Persona sense rostre
entries: Un personatge sense rostre s'aventures darrere de la màscara d'un personatge públic. Aquesta persona és tan natural per a ells com la seva cara oculta i veritable, però dissimula la seva identitat. Feu clic a la taula de Persona sense rostre per determinar la vostra persona o treballeu amb el DM per crear una persona única per al vostre personatge i que s'adapti al to del vostre joc.

rows: A flamboyant spy or brigand
The incarnation of a nation or people
A scoundrel with a masked guise
A vengeful spirit
The manifestation of a deity or your faith
One whose beauty is greatly accented using makeup
An impersonation of another hero
The embodiment of a school of magic
A warrior with distinctive armor
A disguise with animalistic or monstrous characteristics, meant to inspire temor

entries.name: Característica: Personalitat dual
entries: La majoria dels teus companys aventurers i del món et coneixen com a persona. Aquells que busquen aprendre més sobre tu (les teves debilitats, els teus orígens, el teu propòsit) es veuen obstaculitzats per la teva disfressa. En posar-se una disfressa i comportar-se com la teva persona, no pots identificar-te com el teu veritable jo. En treure't la disfressa i revelar la teva veritable cara, ja no et pots identificar com la teva persona. Això us permet canviar les aparences entre les vostres dues personalitats tantes vegades com vulgueu, utilitzant una per ocultar l'altra o servir com a camuflatge convenient. Tanmateix, si algú s'adona de la connexió entre la vostra persona i el vostre veritable jo, el vostre engany podria perdre la seva eficàcia.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Un personatge sense rostre acostuma a interpretar el seu personatge: l'heroi o la persona extraordinària que són cada dia. Tot això és una façana, però, o una part d'elles expressada fins a l'extrem. Per definir una persona, no dubteu a triar característiques d'altres procedències, especialment heroi popular, ermità o noble. Per a la persona que hi ha darrere de la persona, la que realment s'esforça per no tenir rostre, considereu un conjunt diferent de característiques sense rostre. Com a resultat, els que tenen aquests antecedents tenen dos conjunts de característiques, una per a la seva persona i una altra per al seu jo sense rostre.

rows: I'm earnest and uncommonly direct.
I strive to have no personality—it's easier to forget what's hardly there.
I treasure a memento of the person or instance that set me upon my path.
I sleep just as much as I need to and on an unusual schedule.
I think far ahead, a detachedness often mistaken for daydreaming.
I cultivate a single obscure hobby or study and eagerly discuss it at length.
I am ever learning how to be among others—when to stay quiet, when to laugh.
I behave like an extreme opposite of my persona.
Justice. Place in society shouldn't determine one's access to what is right. (Good)
Security. Doing what must be done can't bring the innocent to harm. (Lawful)
Confusion. Deception is a weapon. Strike from where your foes won't expect. (Chaotic)
Infamy. My name will be a malediction, a curse that fulfills my will. (Evil)
Incorruptibility. Be a symbol, and leave your flawed being behind. (Any)
Anonymity. It's my deeds that should be remembered, not their instrument. (Any)
I do everything for my family. My first thought is keeping them safe.
What I do, I do for the world. The people don't realize how much they need me.
I've seen too many in need. I must not fail them as everyone else has.
I stand in opposition, lest the wicked go unopposed.
I am exceptional. I do this because no one else can, and no one can stop me.
I do everything for those who were taken from me.
I am callous about death. It comes to us all eventually.
I never make eye contact or hold it unflinchingly.
I have no sense of humor. Laughing is uncomfortable and embarrassing.
I overexert myself, sometimes needing to recuperate for a day or more.
I think far ahead, a detachedness often mistaken for daydreaming.
I see morality entirely in black and white.

items.name: Competències d'habilitats
items.entry: {@skill Insight} i una habilitat Intel·ligència, Saviesa o Carisma de la vostra elecció, segons correspongui a la vostra facció

items.name: Idiomes
items.entry: Dos qualsevol de la teva elecció

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Insígnia o emblema de la vostra facció, una còpia d'un text de facció fonamental (o un llibre de codis per a una facció encoberta), un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} i una {@item pouch|phb} que conté 15 gp

entries.name: Característica: refugi segur
entries: Com a agent de facció, tens accés a una xarxa secreta de partidaris i agents que poden oferir assistència en les teves aventures. Coneixeu un conjunt de signes i contrasenyes secrets que podeu utilitzar per identificar aquests agents, que us poden proporcionar accés a una casa segura oculta, allotjament i menjar gratuïts o assistència per trobar informació. Aquests agents mai arrisquen les seves vides per vosaltres ni s'arrisquen a revelar la seva veritable identitat.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Fes servir les taules del fons {@background acòlit} del Manual del jugador com a base per als teus trets i motivacions, modificant les entrades quan sigui necessari perquè s'adaptin a la teva identitat com a agent de facció. (Per exemple, considereu que les paraules "fe" i "facció" són intercanviables.)

El vostre vincle pot estar associat amb altres membres de la vostra facció, o una ubicació o un objecte que sigui important per a la vostra facció. L'ideal pel qual t'esforces probablement s'ajusta als principis i principis de la teva facció, però pot ser de naturalesa més personal.

_.special: Insígnia o emblema de la teva facció
còpia d'un text de facció seminal (o llibre de codis per a una facció encoberta)

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania}, {@item merchant's scale|phb}, un conjunt de {@item fine clothes|phb}, i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Cadena de subministrament
entries: Des del vostre temps com a comerciant, conserveu connexions amb majoristes, proveïdors i altres comerciants i empresaris. Podeu fer servir aquestes connexions quan cerqueu articles o informació.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Ser comerciant implicava tenir un cap per als números, una forta personalitat, la capacitat de fer tractes amb adversaris hostils, un fort braç d'espasa per lluitar contra els bandits i la intuïció per saber què vol i necessita la gent. L'art dels negocis és l'art de trobar el millor camí per obtenir beneficis, i aquest camí pot ser diferent amb cada transacció. Es necessita una ment forta i un estómac més fort per tenir èxit. Aleshores, per què vas fracassar?

rows: I didn't have the cutthroat attitude necessary to succeed. I won't make that mistake again.
Even my competitors said I was affable and talented. Those traits should serve me well.
To prosper, you have to be in control.
The customer is always right.
I was cutting corners and breaking deals to maximize profit. That's why I failed.
When I get an idea, I am single-minded in its execution—even if it's a terrible idea.
If I can be everyone's friend, I'll always have support.
My heart wasn't in being a merchant, so I failed. I'm not all that keen on adventuring either, but I need the money.
Survival. Where there's life, there's hope. If I remain alive and flexible, I can succeed. (Any)
Generosity. People helped me when I was down. Now that I'm back on my feet, I'll pay it forward. (Good)
Excitement. Caution got me nowhere in my previous business. I'm not going to let it hold me back now. (Chaotic)
Wealth. With enough coin, I can buy comfort, power, knowledge, and even eternal life. Nothing will stand between me and money. (Evil)
Stability. The mercantile trade was too chaotic for me. I need a nice stable profession, like adventuring. (Lawful)
Redemption. Too many people consider me a failure. So I need to prove them wrong. (Any)
My family means everything to me. I failed them before, and I must not do so again.
My church provides a connection to my god, so I must ensure that it is protected and funded.
My former business partner fell ill, and then our business failed. Part of my new venture involves earning enough to take care of their family.
If I take care of my possessions, they'll take care of me. People come and go, but a weapon or a wand is something you can always rely on.
Although my business failed, the people of my community were kind to me. I'll do everything in my power to protect them.
I owe a dangerous person a lot of money. As long as they're happy, they let my debt rest unpaid.
Why spend gold here when you can buy the same thing for copper in the next town?
I must have the best of everything. Like, right now.
You haven't heard of me? I'm sure that's because of your ignorance and low breeding.
I failed, but I'm awesome. So when anyone else is successful, it must be because of nepotism, dishonesty, or dumb luck.
I find that most people are trustworthy. Hey, where's my belt pouch?
Nothing gets between me and danger except my fellow adventurers. So I'll be sure to put them there.

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: Qualsevol {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} o {@filter set de joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=set de joc} de la vostra elecció, probablement alguna cosa nativa de la teva terra natal

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, qualsevol {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} o {@filter set de joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous= mundane|type=set de joc} amb què ets expert, mapes mal treballats de la teva terra natal que representen on et trobes a Faerûn, una petita joieria per valor de 10 gp a l'estil de l'artesania de la teva terra natal i una {@item pouch| phb} que conté 5 gp

entries.name: Característica: Tots els ulls en tu
entries: El teu accent, manierismes, figures de discurs i potser fins i tot la teva aparença et marquen com a estranger. Les mirades curioses es dirigeixen cap allà on vagis, cosa que pot ser una molèstia, però també guanya l'interès amistós d'estudiosos i d'altres intrigats per terres llunyanes, per no parlar de la gent quotidiana que està ansiosa per escoltar històries de la teva terra.

Podeu dedicar aquesta atenció a l'accés a persones i llocs que no tindries d'altra manera, per a tu i els teus companys de viatge. Els nobles senyors, erudits i prínceps mercaders, per citar-ne alguns, podrien estar interessats a conèixer la vostra pàtria i la vostra gent llunyana.

entries.name: Perquè estàs aquí?
entries: Un viatger llunyà podria haver iniciat un viatge per una d'una sèrie de motius, i la sortida de la seva terra natal podria haver estat voluntària o involuntària. Per determinar per què estàs tan lluny de casa, passa per la taula següent o tria entre les opcions que s'ofereixen. La secció següent, on es parla de possibles pàtries, inclou alguns motius suggerits que són adequats per a cada ubicació.

rows: Emissary
Exile
Fugitive
Pilgrim
Sightseer
Wanderer
I have different assumptions from those around me concerning personal space, blithely invading others' space in innocence, or reacting to ignorant invasion of my own.
I have my own ideas about what is and is not food, and I find the eating habits of those around me fascinating, confusing, or revolting.
I have a strong code of honor or sense of propriety that others don't comprehend.
I express affection or contempt in ways that are unfamiliar to others.
I honor my deities through practices that are foreign to this land.
I begin or end my day with small traditional rituals that are unfamiliar to those around me.
Open. I have much to learn from the kindly folk I meet along my way. (Good)
Reserved. As someone new to these strange lands, I am cautious and respectful in my dealings. (Lawful)
Adventure. I'm far from home, and everything is strange and wonderful! (Chaotic)
Cunning. Though I may not know their ways, neither do they know mine, which can be to my advantage. (Evil)
Inquisitive. Everything is new, but I have a thirst to learn. (Neutral)
Suspicious. I must be careful, for I have no way of telling friend from foe here. (Any)
So long as I have this token from my homeland, I can face any adversity in this strange land.
The gods of my people are a comfort to me so far away from home.
I hold no greater cause than my service to my people.
My freedom is my most precious possession. I'll never let anyone take it from me again.
I'm fascinated by the beauty and wonder of this new land.
Though I had no choice, I lament having to leave my loved one(s) behind. I hope to see them again one day.
I am secretly (or not so secretly) convinced of the superiority of my own culture over that of this foreign land.
I pretend not to understand the local language in order to avoid interactions I would rather not have.
I have a weakness for the new intoxicants and other pleasures of this land.
I don't take kindly to some of the actions and motivations of the people of this land, because these folks are different from me.
I consider the adherents of other gods to be deluded innocents at best, or ignorant fools at worst.
I have a weakness for the exotic beauty of the people of these lands.

_.special: mapes mal treballats de la teva terra natal que representen on ets a Faerûn
petita joieria a l'estil de l'artesania de la teva terra

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: {@item Fishing tackle|phb}, una {@item net|phb}, un esquer de pesca favorit o botes de vadeig de cuir oliat, un joc de {@item traveler's clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: collir l'aigua
entries: Obteniu avantatge en proves d'habilitat fetes amb material de pesca. Si teniu accés a una massa d'aigua que sosté la vida marina, podeu mantenir un estil de vida moderat mentre treballeu com a pescador i podreu agafar prou menjar per alimentar-vos a vosaltres mateixos i a deu persones més cada dia.

entries.name: Conte de pesca
entries: Pots explicar una història convincent, ja sigui alta o real, per impressionar i entretenir els altres. Un cop al dia, podeu explicar la vostra història a qui els oient. A criteri del DM, alguns d'aquests oients es tornen amistosos amb tu; això no és un efecte màgic, i la seva amabilitat continuada depèn de les vostres accions. Pots passar a la taula següent per ajudar a determinar el tema del teu conte o triar-ne el que millor s'adapti al teu personatge. Alternativament, treballa amb el teu DM per crear el teu propi conte de pesca.

rows: Lobster Wrestling. You fought in hand-to-hand combat with an immense lobster.
It Dragged the Boat. You nearly caught a fish of monstrous size that pulled your boat for miles.
Fins of Pure Gold. You caught a sea animal whose fins were made of pure gold, but another fisher stole it.
Ghost Fish. You are haunted by a ghostly fish that only you can see.
Nemesis Clam. A large clam containing a pearl the size of your head claimed one of your fingers before jetting away; one day, you'll find that clam.
It Swallowed the Sun. You once saw a fish leap from the water and turn day into night.
Dive into the Abyss. You found yourself in an underwater cave leading to the Abyss, and your luck has been sour ever since.
Love Story. You fell in love with a creature of pure water, but your brief romance ended tragically.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els pescadors només tenen èxit si passen temps a la seva feina. Com a tal, la majoria dels pescadors tenen una forta ètica de treball i admiren els altres que es guanyen la vida amb honestedat. Els pescadors acostumen a ser supersticiosos i s'adhereixen a esquers de pesca particulars o a llocs de pesca especials. Tenen una connexió amb les masses d'aigua on pesquen i pensen malament en aquells les accions dels quals afecten negativament el seu mitjà de vida.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat de Fisher
rows: I am unmoved by the wrath of nature.
My friends are my crew; we sink or float together.
I need long stretches of quiet to clear my head.
Rich folk don't know the satisfaction of hard work.
I laugh heartily, feel deeply, and fear nothing.
I work hard; nature offers no handouts.
I dislike bargaining; state your price and mean it.
Luck favors me, and I take risks others might not.

entries.caption: Fisher Ideals
rows: {@b Camaraderie.} Good people make even the longest voyage bearable. (Good)
{@b Luck.} Our luck depends on respecting its rules—now throw this salt over your shoulder. (Lawful)
{@b Daring.} The richest bounty goes to those who risk everything. (Chaotic)
{@b Plunder.} Take all that you can and leave nothing for the scavengers. (Evil)
{@b Balance.} Do not fish the same spot twice in a row; suppress your greed, and nature will reward you. (Neutral)
{@b Hard Work.} No wave can move a soul hard at work. (Any)

entries.caption: Fisher Bonds
rows: I lost something important in the deep sea, and I intend to find it.
Someone else's greed destroyed my livelihood, and I will be compensated.
I will fish the many famous waters of this land.
The gods saved me during a terrible storm, and I will honor their gift.
My destiny awaits me at the bottom of a particular pond in the Terra Fata.
I must repay my village's debt.

entries.caption: Defectes de Fisher
rows: I am judgmental, especially of those I deem homebodies or otherwise lazy.
I become depressed and anxious if I'm away from the sea too long.
I have lived a hard life and find it difficult to empathize with others.
I am inclined to tell long-winded stories at inopportune times.
I work hard, but I play harder.
I am obsessed with catching an elusive aquatic beast, often to the detriment of other pursuits.

b.special: botes de vadeig de cuir oliat

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: Un tipus de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania}, {@filter vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type =vehicle (terrestre)}

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania} (un de la vostra elecció), una {@item shovel|phb}, una {@item olla de ferro |phb}, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Hospitalitat Rústica
entries: Com que veniu de les files de la gent comuna, encaixeu entre ells amb facilitat. Pots trobar un lloc per amagar-te, descansar o recuperar-te entre altres plebeus, tret que hagis demostrat que és un perill per a ells. Et protegiran de la llei o de qualsevol altra persona que et busqui, encara que no arriscaran la vida per tu.

entries.name: Especialitat
entries: Abans vas exercir una professió senzilla entre la pagesia, potser com a pagès, miner, criat, pastor, llenyataire o enterrador. Però va passar alguna cosa que et va posar en un camí diferent i et va marcar per a coses més grans. Tria o determina aleatòriament un esdeveniment definitori que t'ha marcat com un heroi del poble.

rows: I stood up to a tyrant's agents.
I saved people during a natural disaster.
I stood alone against a terrible monster.
I stole from a corrupt merchant to help the poor.
I led a militia to fight of an invading army.
I broke into a tyrant's castle and stole weapons to arm the people.
I trained the peasantry to use farming implements as weapons against a tyrant's soldiers.
A lord rescinded an unpopular decree after I led a symbolic act of protest against it.
A celestial, fey, or similar creature gave me a blessing or revealed my secret origin.
Recruited into a lord's army, I rose to leadership and was commended for my heroism.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Un heroi popular és una de les persones comunes, per bé o per mal. La majoria dels herois populars veuen els seus orígens humils com una virtut, no com una mancança, i les seves comunitats d'origen segueixen sent molt importants per a ells.

rows: I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
I have a strong sense of fair play and always try to find the most equitable solution to arguments.
I'm confident in my own abilities and do what I can to instill confidence in others.
Thinking is for other people. I prefer action.
I misuse long words in an attempt to sound smarter.
I get bored easily. When am I going to get on with my destiny?
Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. (Good)
Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law. (Lawful)
Freedom. Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people. (Chaotic)
Might. If I become strong, I can take what I want—what I deserve. (Evil)
Sincerity. There's no good in pretending to be something I'm not. (Neutral)
Destiny. Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling. (Any)
I have a family, but I have no idea where they are. One day, I hope to see them again.
I worked the land, I love the land, and I will protect the land.
A proud noble once gave me a horrible beating, and I will take my revenge on any bully I encounter.
My tools are symbols of my past life, and I carry them so that I will never forget my roots.
I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
I wish my childhood sweetheart had come with me to pursue my destiny.
The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.
I'm convinced of the significance of my destiny, and blind to my shortcomings and the risk of failure.
The people who knew me when I was young know my shameful secret, so I can never go home again.
I have a weakness for the vices of the city, especially hard drink.
Secretly, I believe that things would be better if I were a tyrant lording over the land.
I have trouble trusting in my allies.

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un {@filter set de joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=set de joc}, un amul de la sort, un joc de {@item fine clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb } que conté 15 gp

entries.name: Característica: Mai em digueu les probabilitats
entries: Les probabilitats i probabilitats són el vostre pa i mantega. Durant les activitats d'inactivitat que impliquen jocs d'atzar o calcular les probabilitats del millor pla, podeu tenir una idea sòlida de quina opció és probablement la millor i quines oportunitats semblen massa bones per ser certes, a determinació del DM.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Alguns juguen per necessitat. Altres ho fan per avorriment. Altres es tornen addictes a l'emoció de guanyar-ho o perdre-ho tot amb un gir de fortuna. Per a alguns, el joc és menys una qüestió d'atzar i més una qüestió de buscar tots els avantatges per garantir el resultat. Els millors jugadors ho poden perdre tot, i els pitjors de vegades guanyen. Independentment, sempre es pot dir als jugadors per la mirada dels seus ulls. Lady Luck els persegueix.

rows: I plan for every contingència. Leave nothing to chance!
Every copper wants to be a silver. Each bet is an opportunity.
I'm one of Lady Luck's favored. Anything I try is destined to succeed.
I've lost so much to gambling that I refuse to spend money on anything anymore.
Nothing is certain. Planning is a coward's act.
I can't be sure who I've swindled, cheated, or defeated, so I keep a low profile in public.
The perfect bet is out there somewhere. I just have to keep my eyes open.
I have beaten my addiction, but all it takes is one weak moment and I'll be back at the card table.
Knowledge. Knowledge is power, and knowing which horse to back is the key to success. (Any)
Fate. Whatever happens is fated, regardless of any planning or striving. (Lawful)
Bravery. If you want to succeed, you have to take risks. (Chaotic)
Survival. You can't win if you're dead. Live to fight another day—when the odds might be more in your favor. (Any)
Reliability. When I was in need, I was able to rely on others. Now I want to be the one others rely on. (Good)
Victory. Winning is the real measure of a person. In the end, the only thing that matters is the scoreboard. (Evil)
One person in particular owes me a lot of money, and I need to keep them alive if I want to be repaid.
I'm loyal to the friend or family member who taught me how to gamble.
The person who saved me from my gambling addiction is the only reason I'm alive today.
A patron once fronted me money in exchange for a percentage of my winnings. I owe them a debt of gratitude. And a lot of cash.
A criminal syndicate I once played for isn't happy I left the game, and its enforcers are looking for me.
Urchins once helped me find marks for my games. Now I'm driven to help them escape the streets.
I don't know when to quit. Especially when everyone else is telling me to.
I save my sympathy for my friends, and I have no friends.
You think we're in trouble now? Let me tell you how bad things are likely to get!
You can loan me a little, right? I've got a sure thing. I'll double your money, guaranteed.
I was once a terribly flawed person, like you. Let me tell you how you can save yourself.
I'm a great gambler. I'm just bad at math and logic.

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: {@item Eines de lladre|phb}, un tipus d'{@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una caixa d'almoina maltreta, un {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}, una jaqueta militar, una gorra o una bufanda, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} , un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} i 10 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Tot el trànsit d'entrada i sortida de la Ciutat del Comerç passa per la porta de Hillsfar, la qual cosa la converteix en el lloc ideal perquè els indigents es reuneixin per parlar, xerrar, xafardejar i robar la butxaca. Vas créixer als carrers a l'ombra d'aquell gran edifici d'acer, que acull tant els plomalls vermells com els mags del gremi. Encara que hagis continuat endavant, encara tens amics entre ells, i aquesta vida ha tingut un impacte durador en tu.

entries.name: Característica: Red Plume i contactes del gremi de mags
entries: Quan vivies a la Porta de Hillsfar, vas fer molts amics entre els Plomos Vermells i el Gremi dels Mags. Et recorden amb afecte i t'ajuden en petites maneres quan poden. Podeu invocar la seva ajuda a Hillsfar i als voltants per obtenir aliments, així com equips senzills per a ús temporal. També podeu invocar-lo per accedir a les zones de baixa seguretat de les seves guarnicions, sales i campaments. Nota: aquesta característica és una variant de la funció Soldat.

rows: I appreciate the simple things in life. a song, a warm meal, a sunny day. I don't need any more.
My problems are always caused by others. I'm never to blame.
I am afraid I could wind up back on the streets any day.
I get along with everyone.
I see people as marks for a con and have difficulty feeling true empathy for them.
I have a real flair for matchmaking. I can find anyone a spouse!
I think money is the true measure of appreciation and affection. Everything else is talk or an act.
I don't like having a lot of stuff, just a few simple things I need. I don't like being tied down and tend to leave things behind when I don't need them anymore.
Loyal. I never rat out any of my friends, even when the Red Plumes or the Rogues Guild ask. (Lawful)
Adventurous. I don't like doing the same thing every day. I crave variety. (Chaotic)
Strong. Only the strong survive. I respect those who are strong and powerful. (Any)
Witty. Brains are better than brawn. I rely on my wits and respect others who do the same. (Any)
Honest. Others can do what they want, but I won't lie or steal, even to feed my family. (Good)
Ungrateful. Those who give, only do it to make themselves feel better. I steal from them. (Evil)
The Joydancers of Lliira gave me my instrument when I really needed food. I hate them for that.
Busking has taught me to love music above all else.
The Rogues Guild spared me when I did a job without cutting them in. I owe them a great debt.
I know people hate the Red Plumes, but some of them were really good to me. I help Red Plumes whenever I can, and I respect them. They're just doing what they have to do to get by in this world.
I will be wealthy some day. My descendants will live in comfort and style.
I know how hard life on the streets is. I do everything I can for those who have less than me.
Though I no longer live at the Gate, I am still always concerned about where I will get my next meal.
Years of thieving have become habit. I sometimes steal from strangers without thinking about it.
I am ashamed of my origins. I pretend I am higher-born and fear others will find out the truth.
I think people who grew up in houses are soft, spoiled, and ungrateful. I frequently tell them so.
I am still very uncomfortable wearing nice clothes, sleeping in a warm bed, and eating fine food.
I do not trust anyone who has not had a hard life.

_.displayName: bossa de cinturó

items.name: Idiomes
items.entry: Trieu un d'Èlfic, Giant o Kraul

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una insígnia de Golgari, un {@item pooner's kit|phb}, un escarabat o una aranya per a mascotes, un joc de {@item common clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 mo de monedes mixtes

entries.name: Característica: camins suburbans
entries: Coneixeu camins ocults i subterranis que podeu utilitzar per evitar multituds, obstacles i observacions mentre us moveu per la ciutat. Quan no esteu en combat, vosaltres i els companys que lidereu podeu viatjar entre dos llocs qualsevol de la ciutat el doble de ràpid que la vostra velocitat normalment permetria. Els camins de la ciutat subterrània estan perseguits per perills que poques vegades s'enfronten a la llum del món de la superfície, de manera que no es garanteix que el vostre viatge sigui segur.

entries.name: Encanteris del gremi Golgari
entries: {@i Requisit previ: funció de classe Spellcasting o Màgia de Pacte}

Per a tu, els encanteris de la taula d'encanteris del gremi Golgari s'afegeixen a la llista d'encanteris de la teva classe d'encanteris. (Si sou un personatge multiclasse amb diverses llistes d'encanteris, aquests encanteris s'afegeixen a totes elles.)

entries.caption: Encanteris del gremi Golgari
rows: Truc
{@spell llums dansaires}, {@spell misericòrdia}
{@spell enredar}, {@spell raig d'arcada}
{@spell protegir de les metzines}, {@spell raig d'afebliment}, {@spell grimpat d'aranya}
{@spell animar els morts}, {@spell creixement de la flora}
4th
{@spell insecte gegant}, {@spell heura de presa}
5th
{@spell matanúvol}, {@spell plaga d'insectes}

entries: La màgia de Golgari sovint s'acompanya d'un resplendor verd malaltís i una pudor de podridura.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els membres de l'eixam Golgari són indubtablement productes de la ciutat subterrània, malament enmig de les comoditats de la civilització. Provoquen el mateix malestar en els altres recordant-los l'aproximació inevitable de la mort.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat
rows: Remember, I could kill you in your sleep. Or put centipedes in your bedroll.
I like to remind people of their inevitable demise.
Sometimes I give voice to the whispers of the rot, which I hear but no one else does.
I do my best to discourage anyone from approaching or talking to me.
I have accepted my death. Hence, I don't fear it.
Like roots growing through stone, I am relentless and determined in my action.
I put my knowledge of anatomy to use by narrating the injuries my enemies suffer in grisly detail.
Like a wild animal, I lash out viciously when I'm provoked—and I'm easily provoked.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Stoicism}. All of us are part of the cyclical march of nature, which will continue with or without us. (Neutral)
{@b Nature}. The natural world is more important than the edifices of the city and civilization. (Neutral)
{@b Interdependence}. We are all part of nature's web. (Lawful)
{@b Ambition}. The time of Golgari ascendance is at hand, and I intend to have a prominent place in the new world order. (Evil)
{@b Live and Let Live}. Meddling in the affairs of other guilds is a great way to get squashed like a bug. (Neutral)

entries.caption: Bons
rows: I cherish the finger of a family member who was {@condition petrificat} by a medusa.
I have an identical twin who is as different from me as any person could be.
I want to lead one faction of the guild to a new position of dominance.
I love spending time in the moss-covered building where I took part in my first reclamation mission.
I found something in the sewer that must never come to light.
I am forever grateful to the reclaimer who found me floating facedown in the sewer, moments from death.

entries.caption: Defectes
rows: Death comes for us all, so you can't expect me to take care of someone who can't fight it off.
I assume that anyone outside the Golgari looks down on me.
I feel a need for revenge against those who enjoy the privilege of living above ground.
I don't bother to couch my opinions in flattering words.
I can't help but pocket any trinket or coin I come across, no matter how worthless.
I'm convinced that I'm better and stronger than members of other guilds, isolated as they are from the realities of life and death.

entries.name: Contactes
entries: En la mesura que l'eixam Golgari actua com un únic organisme, esteu connectats amb tots els altres membres d'una manera o altra. Convençut que la resta del món vol aconseguir-te, et resulta fàcil establir vincles estrets amb els teus companys de gremi i més difícil establir connexions significatives amb els altres.
Tira dues vegades a la taula Contactes Golgari (per a un aliat i un rival) i una vegada a la taula Contactes no Golgari.

entries.caption: Contactes de Golgari
rows: One of my parents is an elite assassin, a member of the Ochran.
I learned combat from a kraul.
I know a medusa who is stationed in the guildhall.
I had a torrid romance with a spore druid responsible for a large rot farm.
There's a troll in a remote area of the undercity who seems to find me interesting—and who knows more than you'd think.
An elf lich is determined to see me become a lich someday, too.
A medusa decided it would be more fun to recruit me into the guild than to kill me.
I know a findbroker who can locate just about anything, for the right price.

entries.caption: Contactes no Golgari
rows: An Azorius arrester I literally pulled out of the gutter will do anything for me.
Someone joined the Gruul in a battle against the Boros once, and the sergeant of that Boros squad would love to prove that it was me.
I had a romance with a Dimir agent whom I still feed secrets to.
Roll an additional Golgari contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
I joined the Gruul in a battle against the Boros once, and the chief of that small clan thanks me for turning the tide.
An Izzet scientist resents that I sold a scrapped invention I found in the sewer.
My undercity explorations led me into an Orzhov vault, and a spirit thinks I stole something valuable.
I found a baby beast and sold it to a Rakdos wrangler who remains grateful to me.
A Selesnya druid and I share an interest in the same garden, and we have enjoyable arguments there.
I regularly pick up refuse from beneath a Simic laboratory, and sometimes I talk to the researcher who dumps it there.

entries.name: Com m'encaixo?
entries: Com a part de l'eixam Golgari, sou un instrument especialitzat del cos major. Les teves ordres, quan en tinguis, provenen del mestre del gremi a través dels seus cancellers, que porten els seus missatges per tot el gremi. L'eixam confia en tu per avançar en el bé major protegint una part, per petita que sigui, de la seva existència. Aquesta responsabilitat no vol dir que siguis indispensable; la teva eventual mort també forma part del teu propòsit i funció, i seràs substituït encara que el teu cos proporcioni nutrients per afavorir el creixement de l'eixam.

Un paper d'aventures clàssic per a un membre dels Golgari consisteix a arrossegar-se per entorns semblants a calabossos (les clavegueres i les antigues voltes de la ciutat subterrània) a la recerca dels tresors deixats pels morts. De vegades, és possible que us enviïn a trobar un objecte específic que es creu perdut en una part perillosa de la ciutat subterrània. En altres ocasions, se us podria demanar que recolliu mostres d'un fong específic, recupereu un cos flotant a la fang de les clavegueres o porteu qualsevol botí que pugueu per ajudar a omplir les arques de l'eixam.

És possible que tingueu prou renom per convertir-vos en membre de l'Ochran, assignat a una varietat de tasques relacionades amb el robatori, l'assassinat o la protecció de figures importants del vostre gremi. Pots robar alguna cosa perquè el gremi ho necessita, o perquè la seva pèrdua farà mal a un altre gremi, accelerant el declivi d'aquest grup. Podries ser assignat per matar un enemic obert i actiu dels Golgari, com un capità de Boros excessivament entusiasmat, les incursions del qual a la ciutat subterrània s'han acostat perillosament a prop del santuari interior de l'eixam. O podríeu servir de guardaespatlles d'un dels alts cancellers del Mestre del Gremi Jarad, escortant aquesta figura a través de la ciutat subterrània mentre esteu preparat per intervenir en qualsevol moment si les coses van malament.

Els xamans dels Golgari utilitzen la seva màgia per accelerar el cicle de decadència i creixement. És possible que t'enviïn a escampar espores per una zona que els Golgari volen reivindicar com el seu territori o per convèncer els habitants d'aquest territori perquè l'abandonin. També podríeu enfrontar-vos a l'amenaça sempre present de monstres hostils que envaeixen les regions controlades per Golgari.

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: Un tipus d'{@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}, {@item eines de lladre|phb}

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@item fine clothes|phb}, un {@item disfresses kit|phb}, un {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} de la vostra elecció, un gold- anell xapat que representa una cara somrient i una {@item pouch|phb} que conté 15 gp

entries.name: Característica: Ballad of the Grinning Fool
entries: Com cada Grinner, saps com trobar un amagatall. A qualsevol ciutat de 10.000 habitants o més a la Costa de la Menagerie o a les terres de l'Imperi Dwendalian, pots jugar a la "Ballada del boig somrient" en una taverna o posada important. Un membre del Golden Grin us trobarà i us donarà refugi a vosaltres i a tots els companys que us acrediteu. Aquest refugi es podria suspendre si esdevé massa perillós amagar-vos, a criteri del DM.
Aquesta característica s'ha d'utilitzar amb precaució, perquè no tots els que coneixen la balada són amics vostres. Alguns són traïdors, contraespies o agents de la tirania.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els grinners estan entrenats en l'art del secret i les insinuacions, i són hàbils per amagar-se a la vista per ser la persona més forta i brillant de l'habitació. Les seves habilitats en el subterfugi i el combat es presten bé per a un estil de vida aventurer, i viatjar amb mercenaris i caçadors de tresors crea una excusa convenient per viatjar per terres inclinades per la tirania.

rows: I love the spotlight. Everyone, look at me!
Give me a drink and I'm your friend.
Talk to me about yourself. I'm a hell of a listener.
I hate to start fights, but I love to finish them.
I can't sit still.
I'm always humming an old tune from my past.
When I don't have a reason to smile, I'm miserable.
I'm lucky like you wouldn't believe.
Revolution. Tyrants must fall, no matter the cost. (Chaotic)
Compassion. The only way to make a better world is to perform small kindnesses. (Good)
Justice. A nation built upon just foundations will uphold freedom for all. (Law)
Expression. Music, joy, and laughter are the keys to freedom. (Good)
Self-Determination. People should be free to do as they please. (Chaotic)
Vigilance. A free people must be carefully taught, lest they be misled. (Neutral)
I lost someone important to an agent of the Dwendalian Empire. That regime will fall.
The first people to be hurt by this war will be the common folk. I need to protect them.
Music helped me through a dark time in my life. Now, I'll use music to change the world.
I will be known as the greatest spy who ever lived.
All life is precious to me. I know I can change the world without taking a humanoid life.
The elite in their ivory towers don't understand how we suffer. I intend to show them.
I've never lied once in my life. What? No, I'm not crossing my fingers!
I do everything big! Subtlety? I don't know the meaning of subtlety! Oh, that's a problem?
Being a spy in wartime is painful. I've seen so much suffering, I think I'm losing my mind.
I can't focus on my mission. I just want to carouse and sing and play!
Yeah, that's my name. Yeah, I'm a Grinner spy. Who cares about staying undercover?
I can't afford to trust anyone. Not. Anyone.

_.special: anell banyat d'or que representa una cara somrient

items.name: Idiomes
items.entry: Tria una de Dracònic, Gegant, Goblin o Silvà

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una insígnia de Gruul, una {@item hunting trap|phb}, un {@item herbalism kit|phb}, el crani d'un senglar, una capa de pell de bèstia, un conjunt de {@item traveller's clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 mo (monedes Azorius 1-zino)

entries.name: Característica: Refugi Rubblebelt
entries: Coneixes íntimament les zones de la ciutat que la majoria de la gent evita: barris en ruïnes on els wurms s'ensorraven, parcs coberts de vegetació que cap mà ha cuidat durant dècades i els grans i extensos cinturons de runa de terreny trencat que la gent civilitzada ha abandonat durant molt de temps. Pots trobar un lloc adequat per a tu i els teus aliats per amagar-te o descansar en aquestes zones. A més, pots trobar menjar i aigua dolça en aquestes zones per a tu i fins a cinc persones més cada dia.

entries.name: Encanteris del gremi Gruul
entries: {@i Requisit previ: funció de classe Spellcasting o Màgia de Pacte}

Per a tu, els encanteris de la taula d'encanteris del gremi Gruul s'afegeixen a la llista d'encanteris de la teva classe d'encanteris. (Si sou un personatge multiclasse amb diverses llistes d'encanteris, aquests encanteris s'afegeixen a totes elles.)

entries.caption: Encanteris del gremi Gruul
rows: Truc
{@spell sageta de foc}, {@spell produir flama}
{@spell forçar el duel}, {@spell parlar animal}, {@spell tronada}
{@spell sentits de bèstia}, {@spell esclatar}
{@spell convocar animals}, {@spell Convocar Bombardeig}
4th
{@spell dominar bèstia}, {@spell pell de pedra}
5th
{@spell onada destructiva}

entries: Impulsada pel foc de la ràbia que crema al teu cor, la teva màgia gairebé sempre s'acompanya d'efectes de foc, com ara flames ardent darrere dels teus ulls o ballant sobre les teves mans.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Les maneres Gruul no són les maneres de la gent civilitzada, i els Gruul tenen poca paciència amb les delicadeses socials. Però tenen tradicions i valors estimats, tan importants per a ells com els diferents valors de la cultura urbana i cosmopolita de Ràvnica.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat
rows: Unlike people, the beasts of the wild are friends who won't stab me in the back.
Go ahead and insult me—I dare you.
I scorn those who can't survive away from the comforts of the city.
Don't tell me I'm not allowed to do something.
Laws are for people who are afraid to face their inner beasts.
I smear the blood of my enemies over my skin.
I was, in fact, raised by maaka.
HarrRRAAGGHH! [I rarely form a coherent sentence and prefer to express myself by breaking things.]

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Clan}. My clan is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Anarchy}. No person or law or custom can tell another what to do. (Chaotic)
{@b Nature}. We weren't born tame or domesticated, so we shouldn't have to live that way. (Neutral)
{@b Might}. The strongest are meant to dominate the weak. (Evil)
{@b Rage}. AAAAAARRRRggggh! [To live is to feel and express the rage burning in your belly.] (Chaotic)
{@b Tradition}. The Old Ways must be preserved and upheld. (Any)

entries.caption: Bons
rows: I am determined that one day I will lead my clan—or a new one.
I would give my life for my clan chieftain.
The chieftain of another clan has a grudge against me.
I am devoted to a sacred site in the midst of the rubblebelt.
My weapon is made from the first raktusk I ever hunted.
GrrrRRAAAAGGHH! [I will do anything to prove myself greater than my siblings or ancestors.]

entries.caption: Defectes
rows: If you question my courage, I will never back down.
HrrrGGGAAAARRuuuh! [My anger in battle led to the death of a loved one.]
I'm as stubborn as a batterboar.
I'm so convinced of my superiority over soft, civilized people that I'll take great risks to prove it.
I'm easily manipulated by people I find attractive.
I'm not actually all that angry.

entries.name: Contactes
entries: Els membres dels clans Gruul confien els uns en els altres encara que lluiten pel territori i la glòria. Les seves trobades amb membres d'altres gremis són més sovint violentes que amistoses, però de tant en tant es formen vincles.
Tira dues vegades a la taula Contactes Gruul (per a un aliat i un rival) i una vegada a la taula Contactes no Gruul.

entries.caption: Contactes Gruul
rows: One of my parents is a renowned warrior in my clan.
My sibling has the ear of the clan chief.
I have cousins in a different clan.
When we were younger, I was romantically involved with a prominent warrior in my clan.
A druid in my clan believes I have a destiny to fulfill.
The warrior who trained me remembers me for my exceptional potential.
My clan chief killed one of my parents, who had challenged the chief for leadership of the clan. Some combination of resentment and remorse stirs the clan chief to help me sometimes.
I made a strong impression on Borborygmos.

entries.caption: Contactes no Gruul
rows: An Azorius arrester thinks I can be reformed.
A Boros soldier gives me gifts in exchange for information about other clans' movements.
I once caught and released a Dimir spy.
I consult with a Golgari shaman for spiritual guidance at times.
Roll an additional Gruul contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
An Izzet scientist blames the Gruul for the destruction of his life's work in a raid, but seems to think that I'm not like other Gruul.
I foolishly borrowed money from an Orzhov syndic to indulge a shameful vice.
A close friend left our clan and joined the Cult of Rakdos.
A distant relative is trying to recruit me into the Selesnya Conclave.
I stopped a Simic biomancer from trapping wild beasts to perform vile experiments on them.

entries.name: Com m'encaixo?
entries: Al servei d'un objectiu senzill, tens un paper senzill a jugar: lluitar. Allibera la teva ràbia. Aplana els edificis i derrota els que s'interposen en el teu camí. Sigues Gruul, a la teva manera.

Sovint se us convocarà per participar en una incursió que el vostre clan està llançant contra la ciutat o contra un grup dels seus defensors. El líder del vostre clan també us pot enviar a una missió especial, tot i que gairebé segur que encara es qualificaria com una incursió. Pots unir-te a un petit grup de guerrers Gruul amb una càrrega perillosa a les profunditats dels carrers poblats per saquejar un lloc determinat, recuperar un article robat al teu clan o atacar una guarnició de Boros.

De vegades, el vostre objectiu pot ser més esotèric. Amb les profecies del retorn d'Ilharg el Raze-Boar s'estenen com la pólvora entre els druides Gruul, és possible que se us demani que feu alguna tasca que els druides creuen que accelerarà la seva arribada. Aquesta tasca podria implicar recollir una relíquia sagrada guardada en una volta d'Orzhov o recollir sacrificis per a una gran cerimònia en honor del Raze-Boar.

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania} (un de la vostra elecció), una carta de presentació del vostre gremi, un conjunt de {@item traveler's roba|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 15 gp

entries.name: Característica: Membre del gremi
entries: Com a membre establert i respectat d'un gremi, podeu confiar en determinats avantatges que ofereix la pertinença. Els vostres companys del gremi us proporcionaran allotjament i menjar si cal, i pagaran el vostre funeral si cal. En algunes ciutats i pobles, un gremi ofereix un lloc central per conèixer altres membres de la vostra professió, que pot ser un bon lloc per conèixer potencials mecenes, aliats o contractants.

Els gremis sovint exerceixen un poder polític enorme. Si se us acusa d'un delicte, el vostre gremi us donarà suport si es pot fer un bon cas per la vostra innocència o si el delicte és justificable. També podeu accedir a personalitats polítiques poderoses a través del gremi, si sou un membre en bon estat. Aquestes connexions poden requerir la donació de diners o articles màgics a les arques del gremi.
Heu de pagar quotes de 5 mo al mes al gremi. Si us perdeu els pagaments, haureu de recuperar les quotes endarrerides per mantenir-vos a les gràcies del gremi.

entries.name: Especialitat
entries: Els gremis es troben generalment a ciutats prou grans com per donar suport a diversos artesans que practiquen el mateix ofici. Tanmateix, el vostre gremi podria ser una xarxa solta d'artesans que treballen cadascun en un poble diferent dins d'un regne més gran. Treballa amb el teu DM per determinar la naturalesa del teu gremi. Podeu seleccionar el vostre negoci del gremi a la taula de negocis del gremi o tirar-ho a l'atzar.

rows: Alchemists and apothecaries
Armorers, locksmiths, and finesmiths
Brewers, distillers, and vintners
Calligraphers, scribes, and scriveners
Carpenters, roofers, and plasterers
Cartographers, surveyors, and chart-makers
Cobblers and shoemakers
Cooks and bakers
Glassblowers and glaziers
Jewelers and gemcutters
Leatherworkers, skinners, and tanners
Masons and stonecutters
Painters, limners, and sign-makers
Potters and tile-makers
Shipwrights and sail-makers
Smiths and metal-forgers
Tinkers, pewterers, and casters
Wagon-makers and wheelwrights
Weavers and dyers
Woodcarvers, coopers, and bowyers

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els artesans del gremi es troben entre les persones més corrents del món, fins que deixen les seves eines i empren una carrera aventurera. Entenen el valor del treball dur i la importància de la comunitat, però són vulnerables als pecats de la cobdícia i la cobdícia.

rows: I believe that anything worth doing is worth doing right. I can't help it—I'm a perfectionist.
I'm a snob who looks down on those who can't appreciate fine art.
I always want to know how things work and what makes people tick.
I'm full of witty aphorisms and have a proverb for every occasion.
I'm rude to people who lack my commitment to hard work and fair play.
I like to talk at length about my profession.
I don't part with my money easily and will haggle tirelessly to get the best deal possible.
I'm well known for my work, and I want to make sure everyone appreciates it. I'm always taken aback when people haven't heard of me.
Community. It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthen the bonds of community and the security of civilization. (Lawful)
Generosity. My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world. (Good)
Freedom. Everyone should be free to pursue his or her own livelihood. (Chaotic)
Greed. I'm only in it for the money. (Evil)
People. I'm committed to the people I care about, not to ideals. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I work hard to be the best there is at my craft. (Any)
The workshop where I learned my trade is the most important place in the world to me.
I created a great work for someone, and then found them unworthy to receive it. I'm still looking for someone worthy.
I owe my guild a great debt for forging me into the person I am today.
I pursue wealth to secure someone's love.
One day I will return to my guild and prove that I am the greatest artisan of them all.
I will get revenge on the evil forces that destroyed my place of business and ruined my livelihood.
I'll do anything to get my hands on something rare or priceless.
I'm quick to assume that someone is trying to cheat me.
No one must ever learn that I once stole money from guild coffers.
I'm never satisfied with what I have—I always want more.
I would kill to acquire a noble title.
I'm horribly jealous of anyone who can outshine my handiwork. Everywhere I go, I'm surrounded by rivals.

_.special: carta de presentació del vostre gremi

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: Un tipus de {@filter set de joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=set de joc}, {@filter vehicles (water)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (marítim)}

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: {@item Fishing tackle|phb}, {@item daus set|phb}, {@item playing card set|phb}, o {@item Three-Dragon Ante set|phb}, un conjunt de {@item roba comuna| phb}, {@item bote de rems} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 5 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Sou un dels centenars de pescadors i dones que porten cada matí la recompensa del port d'aigua dolça de Mulmaster als mercats de la ciutat. Heu passat innombrables dies remant a les aigües de Mulmaster i els voltants i els coneixeu a ells i a la resta de pescadors, estibadors i habitants del port millor que ningú. Encara que hagis deixat aquesta vida enrere, encara la visites de tant en tant.

entries.name: Característica: Harborfolk
entries: Vas créixer als molls i les aigües del port de Mulmaster. La gent del port et recorda i encara et tracta com un d'ells. Et donen la benvinguda a tu i als teus companys. Tot i que et poden cobrar per això, sempre t'oferiran el menjar i el sostre que tenen; fins i tot t'amagaran si el City Watch us persegueix (però no si ho són els Hawks). Nota: aquesta funció és una variant de la funció Folk Hero.

rows: I am curious. I want to know why things are the way they are and why people do the things that they do.
I can't sing, but that never stops me from doing it, loudly. Everyone loves a good sea chanty!
I think the High Blade is doing a terrific job, don't you?
I'm very excited that the House Built on Gold is being restored. I am a zealous worshipper of Waukeen.
I am quite superstitious. I see portents in everyday occurrences.
I resent the rich and enjoy thwarting their plans and spoiling their fun in small ways.
I have a sea story to fit every occasion.
I'm a fisher, but I secretly detest eating fish. I will do anything to avoid it.
