items.entry: Un {@item staff|phb}, una {@item hunting trap|phb}, un trofeu d'un animal que vau matar, un joc de {@item traveller's clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Wanderer
entries: Tens una excel·lent memòria per als mapes i la geografia, i sempre pots recordar la disposició general del terreny, els assentaments i altres característiques del teu voltant. A més, pots trobar menjar i aigua dolça per a tu i fins a cinc persones més cada dia, sempre que la terra ofereix fruites del bosc, caça menor, aigua, etc.

entries.name: Especialitat
entries: Has estat en llocs estranys i has vist coses que els altres no poden començar a entendre. Considereu algunes de les terres llunyanes que heu visitat i com us han afectat. Pots passar a la taula següent per determinar la teva ocupació durant el teu temps a la natura, o triar-ne la que millor s'adapti al teu personatge.

rows: Forester
Trapper
Homesteader
Guide
Exile or outcast
Bounty hunter
Pilgrim
Tribal nomad
Hunter-gatherer
Tribal rondador

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Sovint considerats grollers i rudes entre la gent civilitzada, els forasters tenen poc respecte per les delicadeses de la vida a les ciutats. Els llaços de tribu, clan, família i el món natural del qual formen part són els vincles més importants per a la majoria dels forasters.

rows: I'm driven by a wanderlust that led me away from home.
I watch over my friends as if they were a litter of newborn pups.
I once ran twenty-five miles without stopping to warn to my clan of an approaching orc horde. I'd do it again if I had to.
I have a lesson for every situation, drawn from observing nature.
I place no stock in wealthy or well-mannered folk. Money and manners won't save you from a hungry owlbear.
I'm always picking things up, absently fiddling with them, and sometimes accidentally breaking them.
I feel far more comfortable around animals than people.
I was, in fact, raised by wolves.
Change. Life is like the seasons, in constant change, and we must change with it. (Chaotic)
Greater Good. It is each person's responsibility to make the most happiness for the whole tribe. (Good)
Honor. If I dishonor myself, I dishonor my whole clan. (Lawful)
Might. The strongest are meant to rule. (Evil)
Nature. The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization. (Neutral)
Glory. I must earn glory in battle, for myself and my clan. (Any)
My family, clan, or tribe is the most important thing in my life, even when they are far from me.
An injury to the unspoiled wilderness of my home is an injury to me.
I will bring terrible wrath down on the evildoers who destroyed my homeland.
I am the last of my tribe, and it is up to me to ensure their names enter legend.
I suffer awful visions of a coming disaster and will do anything to prevent it.
It is my duty to provide children to sustain my tribe.
I am too enamored of ale, wine, and other intoxicants.
There's no room for caution in a life lived to the fullest.
I remember every insult I've received and nurse a silent resentment toward anyone who's ever wronged me.
I am slow to trust members of other races, tribes, and societies.
Violence is my answer to almost any challenge.
Don't expect me to save those who can't save themselves. It is nature's way that the strong thrive and the weak perish.

_.special: trofeu d'un animal que vas matar

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: Un tipus de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania}, {@filter vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type =vehicle (terrestre)}

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una bossa de {@item caltrops (bossa de 20)|phb}, un petit {@item baratija|phb} que us connecta amb la vida que vau tenir abans de l'ocupació de Phlan, un {@item healer's kit|phb}, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} fosc que inclou una capa i una caputxa, i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 5 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visió general
entries: La presa de Phlan per Vorgansharax és un record clar a la teva ment. Estaves fent els teus negocis quotidians quan les forces del drac verd van sortir de les clavegueres i van assaltar casa teva. Molts dels ciutadans de Phlan, joves i grans, van ser capturats, assassinats o oferts com a tribut a la virulència mutilada. Tu mateix eres un dels capturats. Però, ja sigui amb l'ajuda d'aventurers o amb el vostre propi enginy i determinació, vau escapar.

En lloc de fugir de la regió, has optat per quedar-te i lluitar. Trobant refugi fora de la ciutat i del matoll mortal que l'envolta, lluites contra les llàgrimes de la virulència i els seus monstruosos aliats. Heu après a sobreviure en circumstàncies terribles i desesperades, amb els subministraments que s'esgoten i l'arribada de reforços incerta. T'has acostumat a actuar sota l'abric de la nit, donant els cops que puguis per venjar els amics i la família que has perdut dins del Phlan actualment ocupat. Expulsaràs Vorgansharax, o mors en l'intent.

entries.name: Origen
entries: Allunyat de la teva vida com a ciutadà, t'has adaptat a la vida difícil a les zones salvatges que envolten Phlan. L'ofici que vas practicar encara influeix en el teu punt de vista, la teva manera d'abordar les situacions i la teva manera de contribuir al moviment de resistència contra la virulència mutilada. Pots passar a la taula següent per determinar quina era la teva ocupació abans de la tardor, o triar-ne una que s'adapti millor al teu personatge (selecciona entre la columna general o la columna específica, però no totes dues).

rows: Fisher
Stojanow River Worker
Hunter
Twilight Marsh Worker
Craftsperson
Mantor's Library Scribe
Priest/Priestess
Clergy of Ilmater
Cook
Laughing Goblin Server
City Watch
Black Fist Guard
Servant
House Sokol Retainer
Unskilled Laborer
Bay of Phlan Dockworker

entries.name: Característica: Guerrilla
entries: Heu conegut els boscos, rierols, coves i altres característiques naturals dels voltants en què podeu refugiar-vos o muntar emboscades. Podeu examinar ràpidament el vostre entorn per trobar funcions avantatjoses. A més, podeu buscar el vostre entorn natural per arreplegar subministraments senzills (com ara torxes improvisades, cordes, pedaços de tela, etc.) que es consumeixen després del seu ús. Nota: aquesta funció és una variant de la funció Outlander.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Has renunciat a la vida que coneixies com a ciutadà de Phlan. Tanmateix, la invasió de la virulència mutilada ressona molt dins teu. Potser teniu alguns amics o familiars que van poder escapar amb vosaltres. O, potser, tots els que estimaves van morir o van desaparèixer durant la tardor. És possible que conegueu algú que, contra tot pronòstic, sobreviu dins del matoll i anheleu alliberar-lo d'una vida de perill a la ciutat.

rows: My patience knows no bounds, so long as my goal is in sight.
In life and in struggle, the ends justify my actions.
If you aren't helping me, you'd best at least stay out of my way.
I long for the life that was taken away from me.
Friends and family perished, tragically, before my eyes. I hope never to undergo that again.
Making the right choices in life are important to me. The choices I make might save not just my life, but the lives of others as well.
I can never allow my foes to get the drop on me.
Time is a precious resource that I must spend wisely.
Leadership. The oppressed need someone to inspire them to courageous acts. (Good)
Unpredictability. Keeping the enemy guessing and off-balance is my tactical strength. (Chaos)
Determination. Threats to my home must be eliminated at all costs. (Any)
Freedom. Those who are enslaved and unjustly imprisoned deserve my aid. (Good)
Resourcefulness. Our wits are our most valuable resource in troubled times. (Any)
Unity. Working together, we can overcome all obstacles, even the most seemingly insurmountable ones. (Any)
I'll never let my fellow insurgents down. They are my only remaining friends.
I was separated from a loved one during my escape from town. I will find them.
One of the Tears of the Virulence was a trusted friend, until the day they betrayed the city. They will pay harshly for their transgressions.
An item I hold close is my last remaining connection to the family I lost during the fall.
The dragon who took my past life away from me will feel the full extent of my vengeance.
The knowledge in Mantor's Library is an irreplaceable treasure that must be protected.
I have no respect for those who flee. I harbor a deep grudge against the citizens who abandoned Phlan.
Ale is the only way I can escape the desperation of my circumstances.
It doesn't take much to get me into a fight.
Being an insurgent means doing things that aren't always ethical. I'm still learning to live with that.
My desire to liberate Phlan oftentimes clouds my judgment, despite my best efforts.
I relentlessly despise the Maimed Virulence and his allies. I'd abandon other goals in order to strike out at them.

_.displayName: bossa de caltrops (bossa de 20)
petita baratija que us connecta amb la vida que vau tenir abans de l'ocupació de Phlan
roba comuna fosca que inclou una capa i una caputxa

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania} (un de la vostra elecció), una mostra de la vida que vau conèixer una vegada, un conjunt de {@item roba de viatger|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 15 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Modest

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Enrere han quedat els dies més feliços d'entrar a la posada del Goblin Riure després d'un dia dur de treball. Tot ha canviat i tens sort de ser viu. De tornada a Phlan, us podríeu comptar entre aquelles persones de carrer que sabien quan pagar un suborn i amb qui treballar per guanyar-se la vida. La teva capacitat d'escoltar els vents del canvi t'ha salvat abans, i aquesta vegada t'han permès ser un dels pocs afortunats que es va escapar de Phlan amb alguna cosa més que la samarreta a l'esquena.

entries.name: Característica: Phlan Survivor
entries: Sigui quina sigui la vostra situació anterior, ara sou un dels molts refugiats que han vingut a Mulmaster. Pots trobar refugi amb altres de Phlan i els que simpatitzen amb la teva situació. Dins de Mulmaster, això vol dir que podeu trobar un lloc per dormir, recuperar-vos i amagar-vos de la vigilància amb altres refugiats de Phlan o amb els Zhents dins dels guetos. Nota: aquesta funció és una variant de la funció Folk Hero.

rows: I may have lost everything I worked for most of my life, but there's work to be done, no time to linger on the past.
I worked hard to get where I am and I refuse to let a little hardship stop me from succeeding.
I protect those around me, you never know when one of them will be useful.
I have always gotten ahead by giving, why change now?
I prepare for everything, it paid off in Phlan and it will pay off again.
I will reclaim my home, though the path may be long, I will never give up hope.
I never cared for personal hygiene, and am amazed that It bothers others.
I am always willing to volunteer my services, just as long as don't have to do anything.
Justice. Corruption brought Phlan down, I will not tolerate that any longer. (Lawful)
Acceptance. Stability is a myth, to think you can control your future is futile. (Chaotic)
Hope. I am guided by a higher power and I trust that everything will be right in the end. (Good)
Restraint. I hate those who caused my loss. It is all I can do not to lash out at them. (Any)
Força. As shown in Phlan, the strong survive. If you are weak you deserve what you get (Evil)
Openness. I am always willing to share my life story with anyone who will listen. (Any)
I have the chance at a new life and this time I am going to do things right.
The Lord Regent brought this suffering upon his people. I will see him brought to justice.
I await the day I will be able to return to my home in Phlan.
I will never forget the debt owed to Glevith of the Welcomers. I will be ready to repay that debt when called upon.
There was someone I cared about in Phlan, I will find out what happened to them.
Some say my life wasn't worth saving, I will prove them wrong.
I used the lives of children to facilitate my escape from Phlan.
I am a sucker for the underdog, and always bet on the loosing team.
I am incapable of standing up for myself.
I will borrow money from friends with no intention to repay it.
I am unable to keep secrets. A secret is just an untold story.
When something goes wrong, it's never my fault.

_.special: testimoni de la vida que vas conèixer

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania}, {@item fine clothes|phb}, 20 gp

entries.name: Característica: Legalese
entries: La vostra experiència amb el vostre sistema legal local us ha donat un coneixement ferm dels seus pros i contras. Fins i tot quan la llei no està del vostre costat, podeu utilitzar termes complexos com ex injuria jus non oritur i cogitationis poenam nemo patitur per espantar la gent i fer-li pensar que sabeu de què esteu parlant. Amb gent comuna que no sap res millor, és possible que pugueu intimidar o enganyar per obtenir favors o un tracte especial.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els demandants vénen de moltes varietats. Alguns són espectadors innocents que només volen una compensació justa per les seves lesions. Altres són agents professionals de la sala de tribunals, que fan tot el possible per semblar perjudicats a la recerca d'un gran pagament.

rows: I can't believe I have a chance to join Acquisitions Incorporated! The fun I'm going to have!
I've been wronged my entire life, and the world owes me.
I have always tried to make the best of a bad situation.
The law doesn't protect the honest and the hard working. I'm going to do whatever needs to be done to make things right.
I'm always in the wrong place at the wrong time.
My superiors are smarter and wiser than I am. I do what I'm told.
Never pass up the opportunity to make an easy bit of coin. That's my motto.
I'm beginning to feel like the gods are not on my side.
Justice. Those who break the law need to answer for their crimes. (Lawful)
Freedom. People must have the freedom to do what they want and pursue their dreams. (Chaotic)
Greed. Everyone I see is getting theirs, so I'm surely going to get mine. (Evil)
Chaos. You're out of order! And you're out of order! This whole realm is out of order! (Chaotic)
Humility. I'm just a small part of a larger whole. So is everyone else. (Neutral)
Responsibility. We all have our roles to play. I'll hold up my end of the bargain. (Any)
Others hurt in the same accident that hurt me are my new family. I'll make sure they're taken care of.
The rulers of this place were kind to me, and they have my lifelong devotion.
My parents worry about me, but I'll make them proud.
The only bond that matters is the one holding my money pouch to my belt.
The other new hires at Acquisitions Incorporated are my allies. We have each other's backs.
My legal counsel is my best friend. I owe all my forthcoming opportunities to their hard work.
The person who gains the most reward for the least effort wins.
Three magic beans for just one cow? What a deal!
I have only one vice, but it controls my life.
Sleep is for the weak. We need to keep training more if we're going to be ready for the challenges ahead.
Until my songs are sung in every tavern in this realm, I won't be satisfied.
If people find me unpleasant, that's their problem.

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una insígnia de Rakdos, un {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} (un de la vostra elecció), un {@item vestuari|phb|costume}, un {@item llanterna amb caputxa |phb} de ferro forjat, una cadena de 10 peus de llarg amb enllaços punxeguts, una {@item tinderbox|phb}, 10 {@item torch|phb|torches}, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb }, un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 mo (una barreja de monedes Azorius i Boros 1-zino) i una ampolla de suc vermell dolç

entries.name: Un estil per al dramàtic
entries: Els estils d'actuació de Rakdos solen fusionar acrobàcies estàndard d'estil de circ amb foc, punxes i ganxos de ferro forjat i monstres. Pots tirar un {@dice d8} o triar entre les opcions de la taula d'Opcions de rendiment per determinar el teu estil de rendiment preferit.

entries.caption: Opcions de rendiment
rows: Spikewheel acrobat
Lampooning satirist
Fire juggler
Marionette puppeteer
Pain artist
Noise musician
Nightmare clown
Master of ceremonies

entries.name: Característica: Reputació temible
entries: La gent et reconeix com a membre del culte de Rakdos, i tenen cura de no atraure la teva ira o el ridícul. Podeu sortir-vos amb delictes lleus, com ara negar-vos a pagar el menjar en un restaurant o trencar una porta d'una botiga local, si cap autoritat legal és testimoni del crim. La majoria de la gent està massa intimidada per tu per denunciar la teva mala conducta a l'Azorius.

entries.name: Encanteris del gremi Rakdos
entries: {@i Requisit previ: funció de classe Spellcasting o Màgia de Pacte}

Per a tu, els encanteris de la taula d'encanteris del gremi Rakdos s'afegeixen a la llista d'encanteris de la teva classe d'encanteris. (Si sou un personatge multiclasse amb diverses llistes d'encanteris, aquests encanteris s'afegeixen a totes elles.)

entries.caption: Encanteris del gremi Rakdos
rows: Truc
{@spell sageta de foc}, {@spell mofa i escarni}
{@spell mans ardents}, {@spell xiuxiuegos de disbauxa}, {@spell venjança dels inferns}
{@spell corona de bogeria}, {@spell captivar}, {@spell esfera de flames}
{@spell temor}, {@spell pressa}
4th
{@spell confusió}, {@spell paret de foc}
5th
{@spell dominar humanoide}

entries: La teva màgia sovint produeix un espectacle cridaner, envoltant-te a tu o als teus objectius en una barreja de flama inofensiva i formes ombrívoles. Quan manipuleu la ment d'un oponent, un símbol flamíger de Rakdos pot aparèixer momentàniament com una màscara sobre la cara de l'objectiu.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els membres dels cultes demoníacs no són generalment coneguts com els individus més amables o més estables mentalment, de manera que és probable que tingueu alguna cosa a la vostra naturalesa que us distingeixi dels ciutadans respectuosos de la llei de Ràvnica.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat
rows: I revel in mayhem, the more destructive the better.
When violence breaks out, I lose myself in rage, and it's sometimes hard to stop.
Everything is funny to me, and the most hilarious and bloodiest things leave me cackling with sadistic glee.
I derive genuine pleasure from the pain of others.
I enjoy testing other people's patience.
I can't stand it when things are predictable, so I like to add a little chaos to every situation.
I throw my weight around to make sure I get my way.
I enjoy breaking delicate works of art. And fingers, which are sort of the same.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Hedonism}. Death comes for everyone, so take as much pleasure as you can from every moment of life. (Neutral)
{@b Creativity}. I strive to find more ways to express my art through pain—my own as well as others'. (Chaotic)
{@b Freedom}. No one tells me what to do. (Chaotic)
{@b Equality}. I want to see Ravnica remade, with no guilds and no hierarchies. (Chaotic)
{@b Spectacle}. People are inspired by the greatness they see in art. (Any)

entries.caption: Bons
rows: I have belonged to the same performance troupe for years, and these people mean everything to me.
A blood witch told me I have a special destiny to fulfill, and I'm trying to figure out what it is.
I'm secretly hoping that I can change the cult from the inside, using my influence to help rein in the wanton violence.
I own something that Rakdos once touched (it's seared black at the spot), and I cherish it.
I want to be better at my chosen form of performance than any other member of my troupe.
I am devoted to Rakdos and live to impress him.

entries.caption: Defectes
rows: My family is prominent in another guild. I enjoy my wild life, but I don't want to embarrass them.
I couldn't hide my emotions and opinions even if I wanted to.
I throw caution to the wind.
I resent the rich and powerful.
When I'm angry, I lash out in violence.
There's no such thing as too much pleasure.

entries.name: Contactes
entries: El culte de Rakdos és qualsevol cosa menys organitzat. Les persones sovint passen d'un grup d'actuació a un altre. Gairebé tots els membres del culte coneixen antics companys de repartiment ara en diferents grups, la qual cosa permet la possibilitat d'una xarxa de contactes àmplia.
Tira dues vegades a la taula de contactes de Rakdos (per a un aliat i un rival) i una vegada a la taula de contactes no Rakdos.

entries.caption: Contactes de Rakdos
rows: I was part of a two-person act until my former partner moved to a different troupe.
My sibling and I ran away from home and joined the Cult of Rakdos together. We're very close.
A childhood friend of mine is an attendant in Rix Maadi, the Rakdos guildhall.
My parents brought me into the guild and taught me my trade.
There's a lesser demon in the cult who thinks he owes me a favor, and who am I to argue?
The master of ceremonies in my troupe is well connected with other troupes.
I had a romance with a pain artist in another troupe.
Rakdos himself has witnessed me perform.

entries.caption: Contactes que no són Rakdos
rows: I know an Azorius elocutor who has a very amusing dark side.
A Boros captain really wants to "redeem" me.
I think a member of my troupe is a Dimir agent.
I once convinced a Golgari medusa to participate in a show. We've been on good terms ever since.
I came from the Gruul and still have relatives there.
An Izzet technician provides pyrotechnics for my performances.
An Orzhov oligarch has taken an interest in my career, like a patron of the arts.
Roll an additional Rakdos contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
A Selesnya healer attends my performances regularly.
A Simic biomancer provides mutant monsters to add a taste of the bizarre to our shows.

entries.name: Com m'encaixo?
entries: El Culte de Rakdos fomenta l'acció independent per part dels seus membres. El seu objectiu és fomentar el caos, i creu fermament en posar la seva pròpia casa en desordre abans de portar aquesta missió a la ciutat més gran. Per tant, el vostre paper és executar la vostra visió de la gran sàtira i l'art escènic disruptiu, ja que aspireu a superar els vostres companys de gremi i atreure l'atenció del mateix Rakdos.

Treballes com a part d'una companyia, amb els teus talents artístics utilitzats al servei de la visió d'un mestre de pista. Però la teva actuació és teva i ningú espera que segueixis un guió. De fet, si passes per una actuació sense fer alguna cosa que no has fet abans, és evident que no t'estàs esforçant prou.

_.displayName: llanterna amb caputxa feta de ferro forjat

_.special: Cadena de 10 peus de llargada amb enllaços punxeguts

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un conjunt de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania}, un llibre major del vostre ocupador anterior que conté una petita informació útil, un conjunt de {@item multa roba|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Informador interior
entries: Teniu connexions amb el vostre ocupador anterior o amb altres grups amb els quals vau tractar durant la vostra feina anterior. Pots comunicar-te amb els teus contactes, obtenint informació a criteri del DM.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Si estigueu satisfet amb les vostres pràctiques anteriors, la separació podria haver estat amistosa. Si no, podria haver implicat que els guàrdies armats us allunyin de les instal·lacions. Si t'han passat per alt a la teva posició anterior, potser t'hauria deixat una barreja de ràbia bullent, indistinta pràctica i un gran coneixement d'on estan enterrats els cossos (potser literalment).

rows: My previous employer didn't respect me, and now I'll do whatever I can to gain respect.
The job is important, but the relationships I forge with my coworkers are even more so.
The job is everything to me. Who needs relaxation, hobbies, and a social life?
I know I'm not the best and brightest, but if I put my best self forward, I can overcome anything.
My former boss was an idiot. So was my boss before that. And before that. I'm sure those were all coincidences.
This company is so much better than my previous one. It will always be the best until they stop paying me.
I know this dagger belongs to the company, but I'm sure they won't miss it. Or this flask. Or this armor.
It's only a matter of time before I'll be upper management. I just have to kiss up to my superiors and kick down those beneath me.
Advancement. Money and power can be gained more easily within an organization. I plan to gain as much as possible. (Evil)
Structure. Life goes much more smoothly when you follow the rules and work within a system. (Lawful)
Uncertainty. The more chaos that swirls around me, the more opportunities I can find to profit. (Chaotic)
Justice. I can't stand people being treated unjustly. I do whatever it takes to stop injustice and those who flout the law. (Lawful)
Pleasure. What's the use of working hard and making money if you can't enjoy the finer things in life? (Any)
Power. Money is fine, but real power means never having to say you're sorry. (Evil)
I have a family member in need. I consider them in everything I do.
My peers keep me grounded.
My past mistakes cost someone else dearly. I have to rectify that.
A childhood mentor put me on my current path. If I succeed, I want to repay that mentor in some way.
I value an oath of loyalty I took to a group of friends over everything else in my life.
Although I don't get along well with people, my pet means the world to me.
I know what's best. Trust me.
Flaw? I have no flaws. I'm perfect.
My loyalties are... fluid.
If anything goes wrong, it must be someone else's fault. Let me explain that in detail.
There's right and there's wrong, and there's no gray area in between.
Our superiors might not like what you're doing. I'm going to have to put that in my report.

_.special: llibre major del vostre ocupador anterior que conté una petita informació útil

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una {@item Ink (ampolla d'1 unça)|phb|ampolla de tinta negra}, una ploma, un ganivet petit, una carta d'un col·lega mort que planteja una pregunta que encara no has pogut respondre, un conjunt de {@ article de roba comuna|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Investigador
entries: Quan intenteu aprendre o recordar una història, si no la coneixeu, sovint sabeu on i de qui la podeu obtenir. Normalment, aquesta informació prové d'una biblioteca, un scriptorium, una universitat o un savi o una altra persona o criatura dota. El vostre DM pot decidir que el coneixement que busqueu s'amaga en un lloc gairebé inaccessible, o que simplement no es pot trobar. Desenterrar els secrets més profunds del multivers pot requerir una aventura o fins i tot una campanya sencera.

entries.name: Especialitat
entries: Per determinar la naturalesa de la vostra formació acadèmica, tireu un d8 o trieu entre les opcions de la taula següent.

rows: Alquímia
Astronomer
Discredited academic
Librarian
Professor
Researcher
Wizard's apprentice
Scribe

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els savis es defineixen pels seus extensos estudis, i les seves característiques reflecteixen aquesta vida d'estudi. Dedicat a les activitats erudites, un savi valora molt el coneixement, de vegades per dret propi, de vegades com a mitjà per a altres ideals.

rows: I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition.
I've read every book in the world's greatest libraries—or I like to boast that I have.
I'm used to helping out those who aren't as smart as I am, and I patiently explain anything and everything to others.
There's nothing I like more than a good mystery.
I'm willing to listen to every side of an argument before I make my own judgment.
I... speak... slowly... when talking... to idiots,... which... almost... everyone... is... compared... to me.
I am horribly, horribly awkward in social situations.
I'm convinced that people are always trying to steal my secrets.
Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)
Beauty. What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward what is true. (Good)
Logic. Emotions must not cloud our logical thinking. (Lawful)
No Limits. Nothing should fetter the infinite possibility inherent in all existence. (Chaotic)
Power. Knowledge is the path to power and domination. (Evil)
Self-Improvement. The goal of a life of study is the betterment of oneself. (Any)
It is my duty to protect my students.
I have an ancient text that holds terrible secrets that must not fall into the wrong hands.
I work to preserve a library, university, scriptorium, or monastery.
My life's work is a series of tomes related to a specific field of lore.
I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.
I sold my soul for knowledge. I hope to do great deeds and win it back.
I am easily distracted by the promise of information.
Most people scream and run when they see a demon. I stop and take notes on its anatomy.
Unlocking an ancient mystery is worth the price of a civilization.
I overlook obvious solutions in favor of complicated ones.
I speak without really thinking through my words, invariably insulting others.
I can't keep a secret to save my life, or anyone else's.

_.special: carta d'un col·lega mort que planteja una pregunta que encara no has pogut respondre

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una agulla d'assegurament ({@item club|phb}), {@item silk rope (50 feet)|phb}, un amul de la sort com un peu de conill o una petita pedra amb un forat al centre (o podeu rodar per una {@item trinket|phb} aleatòria a la taula Trinkets del capítol 5), un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Passatge del vaixell
entries: Quan ho necessitis, pots assegurar-te el pas gratuït en un veler per a tu i els teus companys aventurers. Podríeu navegar al vaixell on vau servir, o un altre vaixell amb el qual tingueu bones relacions (potser un capitanejat per un antic company de tripulació). Com que estàs demanant un favor, no pots estar segur d'un horari o ruta que satisfà totes les teves necessitats. El vostre Dungeon Master determinarà quant de temps trigarà a arribar on heu d'anar. A canvi del vostre pas gratuït, s'espera que vosaltres i els vostres companys ajudeu la tripulació durant el viatge.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els mariners poden ser molt difícils, però les responsabilitats de la vida en un vaixell també els fan en general fiables. La vida a bord d'un vaixell modela la seva perspectiva i forma els seus enllaços més importants.

rows: My friends know they can rely on me, no matter what.
I work hard so that I can play hard when the work is done.
I enjoy sailing into new ports and making new friends over a flagon of ale.
I stretch the truth for the sake of a good story.
To me, a tavern brawl is a nice way to get to know a new city.
I never pass up a friendly wager.
My language is as foul as an otyugh nest.
I like a job well done, especially if I can convince someone else to do it.
Respect. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Good)
Fairness. We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards. (Lawful)
Freedom. The sea is freedom—the freedom to go anywhere and do anything. (Chaotic)
Mastery. I'm a predator, and the other ships on the sea are my prey. (Evil)
People. I'm committed to my crewmates, not to ideals. (Neutral)
Aspiration. Someday, I'll own my own ship and chart my own destiny. (Any)
I'm loyal to my captain first, everything else second.
The ship is most important—crewmates and captains come and go.
I'll always remember my first ship.
In a harbor town, I have a paramour whose eyes nearly stole me from the sea.
I was cheated out of my fair share of the profits, and I want to get my due.
Ruthless pirates murdered my captain and crewmates, plundered our ship, and left me to die. Vengeance will be mine.
I follow orders, even if I think they're wrong.
I'll say anything to avoid having to do extra work.
Once someone questions my courage, I never back down no matter how dangerous the situation.
Once I start drinking, it's hard for me to stop.
I can't help but pocket loose coins and other trinkets I come across.
My pride will probably lead to my destruction.

_.displayName: agulla d'assegurament
amulet de la sort

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un {@item kit de disfressa|phb}, un {@item forgery kit|phb}, un joc de {@item common clothes|phb}, un cinturó {@item pouch|phb}, 5 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Modest

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Encara que ets un no humà, malgrat la Gran Llei de la Humanitat de Hillsfar, continues vivint a la Ciutat del Comerç. Ho feu mantenint una identitat secreta, falsificant documents i disfressat. Pocs, si n'hi ha, saben que no ets humà. Si ets un mitgerol o un gnom, passes per una persona petita o per un nen. Si ets un semi-elf, semiorc o genasi, disfreixes els teus trets no humans. Altres races utilitzen una combinació de disfressa i roba oculta per amagar-se. Els vostres motius per fer-ho són els vostres. Potser sou un dissident o l'agent d'una potència estrangera. Potser tens una relació amb algú que no pots suportar deixar. Independentment, aquesta forma de vida t'ha costat molt.

entries.name: Característica: identitat secreta
entries: Heu creat una identitat secreta que feu servir per ocultar la vostra veritable raça i que ofereix una explicació de cobertura per a la vostra presència a Hillsfar. A més, podeu falsificar documents, inclosos documents oficials i cartes personals, sempre que hàgiu vist un exemple del tipus de document o de la lletra a mà que esteu intentant copiar.

rows: Despite its problems, I love Hillsfar, it's the greatest city in the world. The only one for me.
I move from place to place, never staying anywhere long and leaving nothing behind.
I think flattery is the best way to direct attention away from me.
I don't make friends easily. They're a liability I cannot afford.
Risk and danger are exhilarate me. Pulling off schemes and deceptions is a rush.
The First Lord is right, humans are superior. I really admire them, despite the atrocities.
I avoid people of my own race, as well as things associated with my race, lest they give me away.
I live for the Arena. I admire gladiadors and enjoy the thrill of blood on the sands!
Quisling. Supporting the rulers of the land and following the laws is the road to salvation. (Lawful)
Scoflaw. The laws and lawmakers are corrupt. I follow laws only when it suits me. (Chaotic)
Optimist. Everyone Is basically good. Though the government is misguided it will all be okay. (Any)
Secretive. I am in the habit of not talking about myself. My business is none of yours. (Any)
Heroic. I do everything I can to help non-humans, regardless of the personal cost to me. (Good)
Depraved. I have lost my moral compass. The ends justify most any means. (Evil)
The humans of Hillsfar have inflicted terrible harm on me, my family, and my race. I will have revenge.
I am part of an underground network that smuggles non-humans into and out of the city.
I am a partisan. I commit minor acts of defiance against the First Lord and Red Plumes when I can.
I am a spy. I report on events in and around Hillsfar.
My secret identity is the only thing protecting me from the Arena. I will stop at nothing to maintain it.
I am madly in love with a human who does not know my true identity, and I fear rejection if I reveal it.
After years of denying who I am, I now despise myself and other members of my pathetic race.
Years of hiding have made me somewhat paranoid. I trust no one.
I've been lying so often and for so long that I can't help it anymore. I frequently lie for no reason at all.
I am ashamed. I failed to protect a member of my family who was seized and thrown into the Area.
I am struggling with maintaining my secret identity. I subconsciously want to get caught and therefore sometimes let my secret identity slip.
Years of successfully deceiving others have made me cocky. I think no one can see through my lies.

_.displayName: bossa de cinturó

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: Un tipus de {@filter eines d'artesania|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=eines d'artesania} o un {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Idiomes
items.entry: Trieu-ne un d'Èlfic, Loxodon o Silva

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una insígnia de Selesnya, un {@item healer's kit|phb}, {@item robes|phb}, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 5 gp (Azorius 1 -monedes zino)

entries.name: Característica: Refugi del Conclave
entries: Com a membre del Conclave de Selesnya, pots comptar amb els teus companys de gremi per oferir-te refugi i ajuda. Tu i els teus companys pots trobar un lloc per amagar-te o descansar a qualsevol enclavament de Selesnya de la ciutat, tret que hagis demostrat que és un perill per a ells. Els membres de l'enclavament us protegiran de la llei o de qualsevol altra persona que us busqui, encara que no arriscaran la vida en aquest esforç.
A més, com a membre del gremi pots rebre cura i atenció gratuïta en un enclavament de Selesnya, tot i que has de proporcionar els components materials necessaris per als encanteris.

entries.name: Encanteris del gremi Selesnya
entries: {@i Requisit previ: funció de classe Spellcasting o Màgia de Pacte}

Per a tu, els encanteris de la taula d'encanteris del gremi de Selesnya s'afegeixen a la llista d'encanteris de la teva classe d'encanteris. (Si sou un personatge multiclasse amb diverses llistes d'encanteris, aquests encanteris s'afegeixen a totes elles.)

entries.caption: Encanteris del gremi Selesnya
rows: Truc
{@spell arts de druida}, {@spell amistar}
{@spell amistat animal}, {@spell fascinar persona}
{@spell auxiliar}, {@spell missatger animal}, {@spell apaivagar emocions}, {@spell vincle de guarda}
{@spell creixement de la flora}, {@spell parla vegetal}
4th
{@spell aura vital}, {@spell convocar elementals menors}
5th
{@spell obrir els ulls}, {@spell comunió amb la natura}

entries: Els membres del Conclave de Selesnya es refereixen a la seva màgia com "doruvati", una paraula Silva que significa "regal". Quan feu servir aquests regals de Mat'Selesnya, gracioses remolins de llum verda i platejada ballen a l'aire al vostre voltant, i fulles verds fantasmals podrien fluir per l'aire. Una sensació de calor suau i l'olor de flors de primavera o fulles de tardor poden acompanyar els vostres encanteris.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: La majoria dels membres del Conclave de Selesnya són autèntics creients: la comunitat tan unida deixa poc espai per als cínics o desil·lusionats. Són espirituals, empàtics i, en general, pacífics, tret que se'ls desperta a l'acció. Els seus defectes i vincles creixen de manera natural a partir dels seus vincles estrets amb la comunitat.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat
rows: I never raise my voice or lose my temper.
I feel the pains and joys of everyone around me, friend or foe.
I would rather make a friend than thwart an enemy.
I'm always straining to peer into another reality that seems to be just beyond my senses.
I'm uneasy if I can't see plants growing or feel soil beneath my feet.
Seeing illness or injury in any creature saddens me.
I have much to be proud of, but I am still just one strand in the grand, interwoven tapestry of life.
Nature offers rich and abundant metaphors for understanding the complexities of life.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Harmony}. Nothing is more beautiful than voices and actions aligned in common purpose. (Good)
{@b Order}. Like a well-pruned tree, society thrives when everything is kept in good order. (Lawful)
{@b Life}. Preserving life and nature is always a worthwhile endeavor. (Good)
{@b Humility}. Ambition and pride are the roots of strife. (Good)
{@b Evangelism}. When all have joined the Selesnya Conclave, Ravnica will finally know peace. (Any)

entries.caption: Bons
rows: I would give my life in the defense of the small enclave where I first encountered Mat'Selesnya.
I love beasts and plants of all kinds, and am loath to harm them.
A healer nursed me to recovery from a mortal illness.
I'll sing the invitation of Mat'Selesnya with my dying breath.
I cherish a leaf from Vitu-Ghazi that changes color with the seasons, even though it is no longer attached to the tree.
Every member of the conclave is my kin, and I would fight for any one of them.

entries.caption: Defectes
rows: I'm terrified of getting into a fight where my side is outnumbered.
I assume that people mean well until they prove otherwise.
I enjoy comfort and quiet, and prefer to avoid extra effort.
I have a fierce temper that doesn't reflect the inner calm I seek.
I'm convinced that everyone else in the conclave has a deeper connection to the Worldsoul than I do.
I'm trying to atone for the life of crime I led before I joined the Selesnya, but I find it hard to give up my bad habits.

entries.name: Contactes
entries: El Conclave de Selesnya tracta de connexions, de manera que els seus membres cultiven contactes a tot el gremi. El gremi també es dedica al reclutament energètic per atraure conversos d'altres gremis, i sovint aquests nous membres del gremi mantenen amistats amb antics companys del gremi.
Tira dues vegades a la taula de contactes de Selesnya (per a un aliat i un rival) i una vegada a la taula de contactes que no són de Selesnya.

entries.caption: Contactes de Selesnya
rows: A wise centaure trainer believed in me even though I was a terrible student.
A good friend has risen to become a Ledev guardian.
I left my former guild and joined the Selesnya along with a close friend.
The dryad at the head of my enclave has taken an interest in my activities.
A sibling is an instructor at the guild's training grounds.
One of my parents is a votary, tasked with protecting the temple gardens at the Vitu-Ghazi guildhall.
I had a romance with a well-known Selesnya healer.
Trostani, the head of the guild and the voice of Mat'Selesnya, once welcomed me into her presence.

entries.caption: Contactes que no són de Selesnya
rows: I left the Azorius, and a former colleague still resents me for that act.
A good friend, eager for action, left the Selesnya and joined the Boros.
I had a relationship with a guild mate who turned out to be a Dimir agent.
I know a disgruntled Golgari assassin who is ripe for recruitment.
I'm friendly with a Gruul centaure who almost joined us a few years back.
I once had a heated public argument with an Izzet chemister, and neither of us is allowed back into that restaurant.
I paid off my debt to the Orzhov Syndicate, but my good friend was not so lucky and remains indebted to that guild.
At a time of terrible grief in my life, a Rakdos performer made a mockery of my pain, leaving me with mixed feelings of sadness and humor.
Roll an additional Selesnya contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
I have a sibling in the Simic Combine, and we argue every time we see each other.

entries.name: Com m'encaixo?
entries: Encara que el gremi ensenya la importància de sotmetre la voluntat individual al bé del conclave, també celebra la diversitat dels individus, en el mateix sentit que un camp que produeix diferents conreus és més sa que un que dóna un sol cultiu. Aquest principi s'aplica a les teves habilitats com a aventurer. Mentre els vostres esforços es dirigeixin a avançar en els objectius del gremi en lloc de la vostra agenda privada, podeu posar els vostres talents a treballar de la vostra manera única.

Dit això, no heu de perdre mai de vista el fet que formeu part d'una comunitat més gran. Això inclou tot el gremi, és clar, però els vostres vincles amb la comunitat comencen amb el vostre vernadi (enclavament) i el seu voda (líder de la dríade). Les dríades volen saber què estàs fent i quin propòsit serveix, i actuen per restringir les teves accions, o fins i tot expulsar-te del gremi, si determinen que no estàs servint els millors interessos de Selesnya.

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un {@item forgery kit|phb}, un cilindre transparent d'ombra que no té obertura, un {@item signet anell|phb}, un joc de {@item fine clothes|phb} i 15 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Modest

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Vas créixer en un moment en què els mags de Netheril estaven en guerra amb els elfs de Cormanthor. Recordeu estar assegut amb les cames creuades escoltant les històries del gloriós Thultanthar, també anomenat l'Enclavament de l'Ombra i la Ciutat de l'Ombra, i va aspirar a estudiar-hi i potser fins i tot ho va fer durant un temps. Els teus somnis es van estavellar fa uns anys quan Thultanthar va caure del cel sobre Myth Drannor.

Sabeu que hi havia una guarnició Netherese estacionada a prop de Hillsfar i heu sentit rumors que la seva caiguda provenia de traïdors dins de les files. Continueu sent lleial a Netheril i busqueu altres fidels i fanàtics de l'ombra al bosc de Cormanthor i les zones que envolten Hillsfar.

entries.name: Característica: Societat secreta
entries: Tens una manera especial de comunicar-te amb altres persones que senten el mateix que tu amb l'ombra. Quan entres a un poble o ciutat més gran, pots identificar un contacte que et donarà informació sobre aquells que dificulten els teus objectius i aquells que t'ajudarien simplement pel teu desig de veure tornar l'Enclavament de l'Ombra amb tota la seva esplendor. Nota: aquesta funció és una variant de la funció Criminal.

rows: I am a bully; I try to hide it though.
I let my actions speak for themselves
I am important; I will not let anyone forget that.
You are either with me or against me.
I know it is only a time before I am betrayed by those I care for.
I never understand why people get so emotional.
They are out to get me. It is only my cunning that keeps me ahead of them
Everyone has a choice, the one I make is always right though.
Hope. I know even if I need do evil acts, history will be my redemption. (Chaos)
Dedicated. I can do anything I put my mind to (Lawful)
Exciting. I have found the truth of the Shadovar and want to share it with everyone. (Any)
Frugal. I horde my possessions knowing that someday I will be called upon to give everything I have to the cause (Any)
Eloquent. I use my words to sway others to my beliefs. (Any)
Compassionate. It is through love that others will join in our cause. (Good)
They say the Shade broke the bonds of mortality; I want to find out how.
The whispers in my head remind me that there is power to be found in the shadows.
For the glory of Netheril, I will grow in power.
I once lived in Hillsfar, I was chased out before I was able to say farewell.
My true love was a killed by the Red Plumes; I plot to make them suffer.
I had a loved one die in the arena at Hillsfar; I am out to prove I am stronger than them!
I always over exaggerate my abilities.
I cannot bear to let those I care for out of my sight.
I am incapable of standing up for myself.
The group I am with has committed atrocities; I am always worried their actions will become public.
I always enjoy a good mug of ale... or five.
I know what I do is wrong, but am afraid to speak up about it.

_.special: cilindre transparent d'ombra que no té obertura

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un joc de {@item carpenter's eines|phb} molt estimats, un {@item book|phb} en blanc, {@item Ink (ampolla d'1 unça)|phb|1 unça de tinta}, un {@item ink pen |phb}, un conjunt de {@item traveler's clothes|phb} i una {@item pouch|phb} de cuir amb 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Ho pedagaré!
entries: Sempre que tinguis eines de fuster i fusta, pots fer reparacions en un vehicle aquàtic. Quan feu servir aquesta habilitat, restauràs un nombre de punts de vida al casc d'un vehicle aquàtic igual a 5 × el teu modificador de competència. No podeu tornar a pegar un vehicle d'aquesta manera fins que no hagi estat tirat a terra i reparat completament.

entries.name: La vida al mar
entries: La teva vida al mar i al port t'ha modelat; pots rodar a la taula següent per determinar-ne l'impacte o triar l'element que millor s'adapti al teu personatge.

rows: {@b Grand Designs.} You are working on plans and schematics for a new, very fast ship. You must examine as many different kinds of vessels as possible to help ensure the success of your design.
{@b Solid and Sound.} You patched up a war galley and prevented it from sinking. The local navy regards you as a friend.

{@b Favored.} You insisted on thicker planking for a merchant vessel's hull, which saved it from sinking when it smashed against a reef. You have a standing invitation to visit the merchant's distant mansion.
{@b Master of Armaments.} You specialized in designing and mounting defenses for the navy. You easily recognize and determine the quality of such items.
{@b Low Places.} You have contacts in the smuggling outfits along the coast; you occasionally repair the criminals' ships in exchange for coin and favors.

{@b Mysteries of the Deep.} You experienced an encounter with a possibly divine being while sailing alone. Work with your DM to determine the secret about the deep waters of the sea that this entity revealed to you.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els constructors de vaixells són fusters i dissenyadors enginyosos. Sovint tenen un lloc dedicat a la taverna local, ja que els constructors de vaixells són inestimables per a les comunitats costaneres. Alguns viatgen amb flotes navals i podrien servir com a oficials si el seu temperament li convé. Els constructors de vaixells tenen afinitat per treballar amb les seves mans i sovint realitzen gestes de fusteria que altres podrien considerar miraculoses.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat d'armador
rows: I love talking and being heard more than I like to listen.
I'm extremely fond of puzzles.
I thrive under pressure.
I love sketching and designing objects, especially boats.
I'm not afraid of hard work—in fact, I prefer it.
A pipe, an ale, and the smell of the sea: paradise.
I have an endless supply of cautionary tales related to the sea.
I don't mind getting my hands dirty.

entries.caption: Ideals de carpintero
rows: Crew. If everyone on deck pitches in, we'll never sink. (Good)
Careful Lines. A ship must be balanced according to the laws of the universe. (Lawful)
Invention. Make what you need out of whatever is at hand. (Chaotic)
Perfection. To measure a being and find it lacking is the greatest disappointment. (Evil)
Reflection. Muddied water always clears in time. (Any)
Hope. The horizon at sea holds the greatest promise. (Any)

entries.caption: Bons de carpintatge
rows: I must visit all the oceans of the world and behold the ships that sail there.
Much of the treasure I claim will be used to enrich my community.
I must find a kind of wood rumored to possess magical qualities.
I repair broken things to redeem what's broken in myself.
I will craft a boat capable of sailing through the most dangerous of storms.
A kraken destroyed my masterpiece; its teeth shall adorn my hearth.

entries.caption: Defectes de carpintatge
rows: I don't know when to throw something away. You never know when it might be useful again.
I get frustrated to the point of distraction by shoddy craftsmanship.
Though I am an excellent crafter, my work tends to look as though it belongs on a ship.
I am so obsessed with sketching my ideas for elaborate inventions that I sometimes forget little thing like eating and sleeping.
I'm judgmental of those who are not skilled with tools of some kind.
I sometimes take things that don't belong to me, especially if they are very well made.

_.displayName: conjunt d'eines de fuster molt estimats
llibre en blanc

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una insígnia Simic, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb|roba de plebe}, un {@item book|phb} de notes d'investigació, un {@item ink pen|phb}, una {@item Ink (1 unça) ampolla)|phb|ampolla de tinta de calamar}, un {@item oli (matràs)|phb|flascó d'oli} (fet de greix), un {@item àcid (vial)|phb|vial d'àcid} (derivat de sucs digestius), una ampolla d'escates de peix, una ampolla d'algues, una ampolla d'agullós de meduses, una ampolla de vidre de llima no identificada i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp (monedes Azorius 1-zino)

entries.name: Clades i Projectes
entries: Com a investigador de Simic, formeu part d'un clade (un grup divers d'individus que combinen talents diferents per aconseguir un objectiu comú) o un investigador d'un projecte especialitzat a curt termini centrat a abordar una necessitat immediata. Podeu tirar un {@dice d6} o triar entre les opcions de la taula d'Opcions de recerca per determinar la vostra àrea de recerca.

entries.caption: Opcions de recerca
rows: Hull Clade, focused on protection and durability
Fin Clade, focused on movement
Gyre Clade, focused on cyclical patterns and metamàgia
Guardian Project, focused on creating guard monsters and super soldiers
Crypsis Project, focused on intelligence and counterintelligence
Independent research in a new area

entries.name: Característica: Investigador
entries: Quan intentes aprendre o recordar un fet màgic o científic, si no coneixes aquesta informació, saps on i de qui la pots obtenir. Normalment, aquesta informació prové d'un laboratori de Simic, o de vegades d'una instal·lació d'Izzet, una biblioteca, una universitat o un estudiós independent o una altra persona o criatura dota. Saber on es pot trobar la informació no et permet aprendre automàticament; potser haureu d'oferir suborns, favors o altres incentius per induir la gent a revelar els seus secrets.

El vostre DM pot decidir que el coneixement que busqueu s'amaga en un lloc inaccessible o que simplement no es pot trobar. Desenterrar els secrets més profunds del multivers pot requerir una aventura o fins i tot una campanya sencera.

entries.name: Encanteris del gremi Simic
entries: {@i Requisit previ: funció de classe Spellcasting o Màgia de Pacte}

Per a tu, els encanteris de la taula d'encanteris del gremi Simic s'afegeixen a la llista d'encanteris de la teva classe d'encanteris. (Si sou un personatge multiclasse amb diverses llistes d'encanteris, aquests encanteris s'afegeixen a totes elles.)

entries.caption: Encanteris del gremi Simic
rows: Truc
{@spell esquitx àcid}, {@spell arts de druida}
{@spell detectar malalties i metzines}, {@spell retirada estratègica}, {@spell botar}
{@spell ego alteració}, {@spell esperonar habilitat}, {@spell engrandir/enxiquir}
{@spell forma gasosa}, {@spell respirar sota l'aigua}, {@spell paret del vent}
4th
{@spell llibertat de moviments}, {@spell polimorfia}
5th
{@spell creació}

entries: Quan la teva màgia provoca alteracions físiques en tu mateix o en els altres, el resultat sovint mostra les característiques de peixos, amfibis o altres criatures que viuen a l'aigua. Els remolins verds blaus d'energia màgica acompanyen de vegades el vostre encanteri, formant espirals que reflecteixen la perfecció matemàtica de la natura.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: L'estranya ciència de la Simic Combine atrau un determinat tipus de personalitat i abasta un conjunt de creences sobre la naturalesa de la vida. Els vincles i els defectes dels membres de Simic es deriven de la seva investigació científica, inclosa la creació de noves formes de vida, a les quals poden vincular-se molt.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat
rows: I can't wait to see what I become next!
I am convinced that everything inclines toward constant improvement.
I'm eager to explain every detail of my most intricate experiments and theories to anyone who shows the least bit of interest.
I assume that everyone needs even the most basic concepts explained to them.
I describe everything that happens as if it were going into my research notes (and it often is).
I am insatiably curious about the seemingly infinite forms and adaptations of life.
I can't resist prying into anything forbidden, since it must be terribly interesting.
I employ a highly technical vocabulary to avoid imprecision and ambiguity in my communication.

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Change}. All life is meant to progress toward perfection, and our work is to hurry it along—no matter what must be upended along the way. (Chaotic)
{@b Knowledge}. Understanding the world is more important than what you do with your knowledge. (Neutral)
{@b Greater Good}. I want to reshape the world into higher forms of life so that all can enjoy evolution. (Good)
{@b Logic}. It's foolish to let emotions and principles interfere with the conclusions of logic. (Lawful)
{@b Superiority}. My vast intellect and strength are directed toward increasing my sway over others. (Evil)

entries.caption: Bons
rows: I helped create a krasis that I love like a pet and would carry with me everywhere... except it's the size of a building, and it might eat me.
In my laboratory, I discovered something that I think could eliminate half the life on Ravnica.
The other researchers in my clade are my family—a big, eccentric family including members and parts of many species.
The laboratory where I did my research contains everything that is precious to me.
I will get revenge on the shortsighted fool who killed my precious krasis creation.
Everything I do is an attempt to impress someone I love.

entries.caption: Defectes
rows: I have a rather embarrassing mutation that I do everything I can to keep hidden.
I'm more interested in taking notes on monstrous anatomy than in fighting monsters.
Every social situation I'm in seems to lead to my asking rude personal questions.
I'm supremely confident in my ability to adapt to any situation and handle any danger.
I'll take any risk to earn recognition for my scientific brilliance.
I have a tendency to take shortcuts in my research and any other tasks I have to complete.

entries.name: Contactes
entries: La naturalesa fluida dels clades, les llistes dels quals abasten diferents laboratoris i canvien a mesura que els investigadors descobreixen nous interessos, crea abundants connexions entre els Simic. Els membres del gremi viuen en dolines aquòtiques anomenades zonots, i el seu aïllament els protegeix de molt contacte amb forasters. No obstant això, un bon nombre de membres de Simic són antics membres d'altres gremis.
Tira dues vegades a la taula Simic Contacts (per a un aliat i un rival) i una vegada a la taula No Simic Contacts.

entries.caption: Contactes Simic
rows: My research builds on my parents' work and takes it in interesting new directions.
If a serious problem confounds me, I can count on my mentor to provide clarity of thought.
A former laboratory colleague went on to work on the Guardian Project.
A former colleague has ventured into fields of research that are possibly immoral and almost certainly illegal.
A former lover is now the supervisor of a prominent clade.
My sibling has become an almost unrecognizable mutant.
An old friend has retreated into a secluded life as an ascetic deepsage, devoted to contemplating philosophical principles.
My former clade supervisor is now engaged in field research studying some of the largest beasts and monsters on Ravnica.

entries.caption: Contactes no simics
rows: My older sibling is upset that I didn't follow them into the Azorius.
A Boros sergeant is always asking questions about my work, but I suspect they're genuinely curious.
A friend in my clade thinks I don't know they're a Dimir agent.
I helped a Golgari spore druid with the fertilization and growth of their fungus field.
I can't fathom what could have made my childhood friend run off and join the Gruul.
I love comparing notes with my friend in the Izzet, though our fields of research are very different.
I borrowed a lot of money from an Orzhov syndic to help finance my research.
A Rakdos ringmaster has taken an interest in my research which, come to think of it, might make a nice sideshow act.
I left the Selesnya—and a lover—behind when I joined the Simic.
Roll an additional Simic contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.

entries.name: Com m'encaixo?
entries: Com a aventurer de Simic, la vostra missió probablement s'alinea amb la filosofia adaptacionista; els desacords i les tensions entre els gremis aviat esclataran en un conflicte obert, i el vostre gremi necessita la vostra ajuda per garantir que els Simic sobrevisquin. Aquesta ajuda podria venir en forma de defensa contra les incursions de Golgari als zonots de Simic o protegir la investigació de Simic de la intrusió d'Azorius. També podria implicar un treball diplomàtic més subtil per mantenir l'equilibri entre els gremis, o subterfugis destinats a soscavar la presa de poder d'un altre gremi.

La superació personal també és una part important de la vostra missió. Qualsevol cosa que pugueu fer per fer-vos més capaç, ja sigui aprenent un nou encanteri o adoptant una nova mutació hibridant, dóna al Simic una arma més forta en el seu arsenal. La combinació ha de canviar per sobreviure, i això significa que els membres individuals del gremi també han de créixer i adaptar-se.

_.displayName: llibre de notes de recerca
matràs d'oli (fet de greix)
vial d'àcid (derivat dels sucs digestius)

_.special: ampolla de vidre de llim no identificat

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una armilla de cuir elegant o un parell de botes de cuir, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} i una {@item pouch|phb} de cuir amb 15 gp

entries.name: Característica: Baix baix
entries: Coneixeu una xarxa de contrabandistes que estan disposats a ajudar-vos a sortir de situacions difícils. Mentre estigueu en una ciutat, ciutat o una altra comunitat de mida similar (a criteri del DM), vosaltres i els vostres acompanyants podeu allotjar-vos gratuïtament en cases segures. Les cases segures proporcionen un estil de vida pobre. Mentre us allotgeu en una casa segura, podeu optar per mantenir la vostra presència (i la dels vostres acompanyants) en secret.

entries.name: Reclama la fama
entries: Tots els contrabandistes tenen una història que els diferencia dels criminals comuns. Amb l'enginy, l'habilitat de navegar o la llengua platejada, vas viure per explicar la història, i ho expliques sovint. Pots passar a la taula següent per determinar la teva reclamació o triar-ne una que s'adapti millor al teu personatge.

rows: Spirit of the Whale. You smuggled stolen dwarven spirits in the body of a dead whale being pulled behind a fishing boat. When you delivered the goods, the corpse suddenly exploded, sending whale meat and whiskey bottles for half a mile.
Cart and Sword. You drove a cart filled with stolen art through the middle of a battlefield while singing sea shanties to confuse the combatants.
The Recruit. You enlisted in another nation's navy for the purpose of smuggling stolen jewels to a distant port. You attained a minor rank before disappearing from the navy and making your way here.

River of Shadows. Your riverboat accidentally slipped through the veil into the Erm de l'Ombra for several hours. While you were there, you sold some stolen dragonborn artifacts before returning to this plane and paddling home.

Gold-Hearted. You agreed to transport a family escaping a war. The baby began to cry at a checkpoint, and you gave the guards all your gold to let you pass. The family never found out about this gesture.

Playing Both Sides. You once smuggled crates of crossbow bolts and bundles of arrows, each destined for an opposing side in a regional war, at the same time. The buyers arrived within moments of each other but did not discover your trickery.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: En general, els contrabandistes valoren la supervivència, i després el benefici, per sobre d'altres coses. Un podria formar part d'una organització més gran o dirigir un petit vaixell de contraban. Els contrabandistes viuen les mentides que han dit i tenen una capacitat natural per recordar totes les falsedats i mitges veritats que mai han esbocat.

entries.caption: Trets de personalitat del contrabandista
rows: I love being on the water but hate fishing.
I think of everything in terms of monetary value.
I never stop smiling.
Nothing rattles me; I have a lie for every occasion.
I love gold but won't cheat a friend.
I enjoy doing things others believe to be impossible.
I become wistful when I see the sun rise over the ocean.
I am no common criminal; I am a mastermind.

entries.caption: Ideals contrabandistes
rows: {@b Wealth} Heaps of coins in a secure vault is all I dream of. (Any)
{@b Smuggler's Code} I uphold the unwritten rules of the smugglers, who do not cheat one another or directly harm innocents. (Lawful)
{@b All for a Coin} I'll do nearly anything if it means I turn a profit. (Evil)
{@b Peace and Prosperity} I smuggle only to achieve a greater goal that benefits my community. (Good)
{@b People} For all my many lies, I place a high value on friendship. (Any)
{@b Daring} I am most happy when risking everything. (Any)

entries.caption: Bons de contrabandista
rows: My vessel was stolen from me, and I burn with the desire to recover it.
I intend to become the leader of the network of smugglers that I belong to.
I owe a debt that cannot be repaid in gold.
After one last job, I will retire from the business.
I was tricked by a fellow smuggler who stole something precious from me. I will find that thief.
I give most of my profits to a charitable cause, and I don't like to brag about it.

entries.caption: Defectes del contrabandista
rows: Lying is reflexive, and I sometimes engage in it without realizing.
I tend to assess my relationships in terms of profit and loss.
I believe everyone has a price and am cynical toward those who present themselves as virtuous.
I struggle to trust the words of others.
Few people know the real me.
Though I act charming, I feel nothing for others and don't know what friendship is.

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: Un tipus de {@filter set de joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=set de joc}, {@filter vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (terrestre)}

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Una insígnia de rang, un trofeu pres d'un enemic caigut (un {@item daga|phb}, una fulla trencada o un tros d'estendard), un os {@item daus|phb} o {@item playing cards| phb}, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} que conté 10 gp

entries.name: Característica: Grau militar
entries: Tens un grau militar de la teva carrera com a soldat. Els soldats lleials a la vostra antiga organització militar encara reconeixen la vostra autoritat i influència, i us defereixen si són de rang inferior. Podeu invocar el vostre rang per exercir influència sobre altres soldats i requisar equips senzills o cavalls per a un ús temporal. Normalment també podeu accedir a campaments i fortaleses militars amistoses on es reconeix el vostre rang.

entries.name: Especialitat
entries: Durant el vostre temps com a soldat, vau tenir un paper específic a jugar a la vostra unitat o exèrcit. Tira un d8 o tria entre les opcions de la taula següent per determinar el teu rol:

rows: Officer
Scout
Infantry
Cavalry
Healer
Quartermaster
Standard-bearer
Support staff (cook, blacksmith, or the like)

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els horrors de la guerra combinats amb la rígida disciplina del servei militar deixen la seva empremta en tots els soldats, configurant els seus ideals, creant vincles forts i sovint deixant-los marcats i vulnerables a la por, la vergonya i l'odi.

rows: I'm always polite and respectful.
I'm haunted by memories of war. I can't get the images of violence out of my mind.
I've lost too many friends, and I'm slow to make new ones.
I'm full of inspiring and cautionary tales from my military experience relevant to almost every combat situation.
I can stare down a hell hound without flinching.
I enjoy being strong and like breaking things.
I have a crude sense of humor.
I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.
Greater Good. Our lot is to lay down our lives in defense of others. (Good)
Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority. (Lawful)
Independence. When people follow orders blindly, they embrace a kind of tyranny. (Chaotic)
Might. In life as in war, the stronger force wins. (Evil)
Live and Let Live. Ideals aren't worth killing over or going to war for. (Neutral)
Nation. My city, nation, or people are all that matter. (Any)
I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
Someone saved my life on the battlefield. To this day, I will never leave a friend behind.
My honor is my life.
I'll never forget the crushing defeat my company suffered or the enemies who dealt it.
Those who fight beside me are those worth dying for.
I fight for those who cannot fight for themselves.
The monstrous enemy we faced in battle still leaves me quivering with fear.
I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.
I made a terrible mistake in battle that cost many lives—and I would do anything to keep that mistake secret.
My hatred of my enemies is blinding and unreasoning.
I obey the law, even if the law causes misery.
I'd rather eat my armor than admit when I'm wrong.

_.special: trofeu pres d'un enemic caigut (una daga, una fulla trencada o un tros d'estendard)

items.name: Competències d'eines
items.entry: One type of {@filter set de joc|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=set de joc}, eines de lladre

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: Un ganivet petit, un joc de {@item common clothes|phb}, un {@item baratija|phb} de la vida que vas quedar per defensar, un cinturó {@item pouch|phb} amb 10 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visió general
entries: "Necessitem marxar, ara!" Aquestes paraules encara persegueixen els teus somnis a la nit. Quan tothom fugia de Phlan, tu decideixes quedar-te. Ja sigui per un vincle emocional o per la recerca de riqueses, vau prendre la decisió que afectaria la resta de la vostra vida.

El menjar es va fer més escàs per als que no tenien connexió. Et vas convertir en un captaire i per mantenir-te amb vida vas intercanviar informació a qualsevol persona interessada amb menjar o or de sobra. Vas ser bo en el que vas fer i et vas pensar invencible. Això va canviar quan vas ser capturat per les Llàgrimes de la virulència, els soldats de Vorgansharax, la virulència mutilada, per vendre secrets a aquells decidits a enderrocar el drac. T'han tancat a les cel·les de Stojanow Gate. Les primeres setmanes vas esperar seguir viu. A mesura que les setmanes es van convertir en mesos i els interrogatoris van continuar, vas començar a resar per la mort.

entries.name: Característica: Ex-convicte
entries: Els coneixements adquirits durant el vostre empresonament us permeten conèixer els guàrdies i els carcerers locals. Ja sabeu quina acceptarà suborns o busqueu cap a un altre costat. També podeu buscar refugi de les autoritats amb altres delinqüents de la zona. Nota: aquesta característica és una variant de la característica Courtier.

rows: I am a bully; others will suffer as I have.
I always say yes even when I mean no; it's just easier.
I aim to misbehave.
I go out of my way to frustrate or anger those in power.
I strive to obey the law. I will never again make the mistake of going against authority.
I always plan everything out. The one time I let others plan things it did not end well for me.
I take blame to protect others from pain.
I hoard information, you never know what may come in handy.
Loss. I freely give those who offend me what was so brutally denied me, death. (Chaos)
Dedication. I never betray those who trust me. (Law)
Vengeance. I use any means to get information I need; I have been well taught. (Evil)
Redemption. Everyone deserves a second chance. (Good)
Resilience. I can survive any challenge (Any)
Leadership. The best teams are made up of those that society has discarded.
I take up arms to help establish a free Phlan.
The horrors of my time in Stojanow haunt my dreams, only after a day of hard work can I find sleep.
I am indebted to those who freed me from prison, I will repay this debt.
My torturer survived the attack that set me free, I will find him/her.
I will not rest while others suffer fates similar to mine.
I am searching for a way to heal the scars of Stojanow, both physical and emotional.
During stressful times, I find myself crying for no reason.
My nerve endings are shot from the interrogations; I am numb to all but the harshest touch.
I am incapable of standing up for myself.
I folded under the torture, and gave information that I promised would be kept secret. My life would be in jeopardy if others found out.
Survival is worth more than friendship.
The ghosts from my past hinder my actions.

_.displayName: baratija de la vida que et vas quedar per defensar

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: {@item Herbalism kit|phb}, un petit article de joieria diferent de la teva tribu, una {@item hunting trap|phb}, un conjunt de {@item common clothes|phb} i un cinturó {@item bossa |phb} que conté 5 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Pobre

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Vas néixer en una tribu nòmada que va anomenar Ticklebelly Hills casa seva. Vas migrar d'un lloc a un altre, vivint de la terra amb la teva tribu. La tribu viatjaria estacionalment cap al sud, cap al mar d'herba i el Cairn del Gegant, al nord fins a les Muntanyes Espina del Drac, i fins i tot de tant en tant cap a l'est a través del riu Stojanow fins als límits del bosc de Quivering.

En les vostres migracions, la vostra gent ha conegut les tribus de gegants de pedra que poblen el Cairn del Gegant. Els cultistes del drac van arribar als turons un dia: usuaris de màgia vestits de violeta i muntant bèsties horribles, guerrers vestits de negre amb màscares malvades i fins i tot soldats de la ciutat propera de Phlan. Llavors el drac anomenat Vorgansharax va arribar i es va amagar als turons, fent créixer matolls horribles i els animals actuen de manera inusual. Els cultistes van començar a assaltar campaments nòmades perquè les víctimes les ofereixin al verme. Finalment, el drac va passar a atacar Phlan, però la vida no va tornar a ser la mateixa per als nòmades dels turons de Ticklebelly.

entries.name: Característica: A casa en estat salvatge
entries: El desert és la vostra llar i us sentiu còmode habitant-hi. Pots trobar un lloc per amagar-te, descansar o recuperar-te quan estàs a la natura. Aquest lloc de descans és prou segur com per ocultar-vos de la majoria de les amenaces naturals. Les amenaces que són sobrenaturals, màgiques o que et busquen activament poden fer-ho amb dificultat depenent de la naturalesa de l'amenaça (tal com determini el DM). No obstant això, aquesta funció no us protegeix ni us amaga de les crides, les indagacions mentals ni les amenaces que no requereixen necessàriament els cinc sentits per trobar-vos. Nota: aquesta funció és una variant de la funció Folk Hero.

entries.name: Característiques suggerides
entries: Els nòmades de pessigolles només s'aventuren a la civilització quan cal. Ets social dins de la teva tribu, amb tribus d'altres nòmades i fins i tot amb les tribus gegants de pedra que poblen el Cairn del Gegant. Tanmateix, altres comunitats tendeixen a posar-vos en guàrdia o a posar-vos en un estat de meravella. Va ser aquesta meravella la que us va atraure a una vida d'aventures? D'altra banda, sou ferotgement protector i dedicat a la vostra tribu. Potser va ser aquesta dedicació la que us va portar a aventurar-vos; ja sigui per voluntat pròpia o a instàncies dels líders de la teva tribu.

rows: I eagerly inject myself into the unknown.
Villages, towns, and cities do not suit me. I'd rather be out in the wilderness any day.
I accomplish my tasks efficiently, using as few resources as possible.
It's difficult for me to remain in one place for long.
I loudly brag about my tribe every chance I get.
Having walked among giants, I am fearless in the face of bigger creatures.
I am quiet and reserved, but observant. Nothing escapes my attention.
My word is my bond. I see a promise to completion, even if it conflicts with my beliefs.
Kinship. Family is most important in life. Though I may be far from my own, the bonds of family must be protected in others' lives as well. (Good)
Preservation. Nature must not be despoiled by encroaching civilization. (Any)
Wanderlust. One must expand their horizons by seeing the world and exploring. (Chaos)
Isolation. My tribe and its ways must be protected and shielded from outside influence. (Neutral)
Protection. Threats to the land and to the people must be dealt with at any and all costs. (Law)
Belonging: All creatures have a place in the world, so I strive to help others find theirs. (Good)
I ache to return to my tribe and the family I left, but cannot until my obligations are fulfilled.
The dragon cultists that invaded my homeland stole away one of my tribe's people. I will not know rest until I've found them.
The dragon's presence in the hills destroyed valuable territory and resulted in deaths within my tribe. The creature must pay for what it has done.
I carry a trinket that spiritually and emotionally ties me to my people and my home.
I discovered a strange relic in the hills during my tribe's wanderings. I must discover what it is.
One of the stone giant clans from the Giant's Cairn has graced me with a mark of kinship.
I throw myself and my friends into situations rarely ever thinking about consequences.
Unfamiliar people and surroundings put me on edge.
I have absolutely no patience for slowpokes and those who prove indecisive.
My desire to experience new things causes me to make unsafe choices.
I am overly protective of nature, sometimes to the detriment of my companions and myself.
My lack of worldliness often proves my undoing in social, commercial, and hostile situations.

_.special: petit article de joieria diferent de la teva tribu

items.name: Equipament
items.entry: {@item Eines de lladre|phb}, una capa grisa, insígnia del xèrif (insígnia) un joc de {@item fines clothes|phb} i 17 gp

entries.name: Estil de vida
entries: Modest

entries.name: Visió general
entries: Sou una de les moltes persones que s'asseguren que les rutes comercials estiguin clares en TOT moment. Assegureu que la Gran Llei del Comerç es segueix a tota costa. Treballeu sol o en grups per sufocar bandolers i bandolers que poden impedir que les rutes comercials passin. Investigueu possibles emboscades i possibles rumors sobre algú que vol robar o aturar caravanes. Ets tant un investigador com un policia.
